content: Top takeaway: Country of origin should be shown, and advanced search options added. Pros: it's possible to find goods, but not always what you want. Cons: the search is extremely basic and often turns up irrelevant goods. There is no advanced search at all. You can't narrow your search by price range, brand, country of manufacture, rating level, or anything. Worst of all: for people who want to buy from democracies, there are goods, but it's very hard to find them or confirm where they are made.

SSSSSLLLLLOOOOOOOWWWWWW if it even works at all... If you're feeling nostalgic for the days of dialup you should totally download this app. I personally love staring at a blank screen for 2-3 minutes before being shown a picture of a dog with the message that "something went wrong on our end" when all I want to do is check on an order that you haven't sent me any updates on despite me specifically picking that option.... You can take this app and stick it all up in your wrong end.

Uninstalled because I just got too frustrated. The search results are just getting worse, they seem to have no relationship to the search terms, even if you use quotation marks to get an exact match. Also fewer filter options to improve results. So Target, Bed Bath and Beyond, and Walmart are actually getting most of my business because I can actually find things I want to buy.

Right now, the early access advertisement keeps flashing up while I'm searching for something and the search gets reset. Between that and the frequent crashes, it's just not worth using in its current state. The Prime Video and Music apps are equally as buggy and frequently crash. I would be embarrassed if I owned a large tech company that couldn't even produce a stable flagship app. My guess is that their QA and possibly even development, have been outsourced to the lowest bidder.

It's just like the website, minus the speed, features, usability and convenience. I don't understand why this even exists. Want to zoom a user photo? That's too damn bad. Want 1 product page open while you look at a 2nd? Sucks to be you. Rather just use the web page again, or use it to view a 2nd product you're considering? Nope! This app will hijack your web browser and force you to use the crippled interface. Want to view product pics? No. None load for some items. Then the app locks up.

Been using this app for years, loved it and never had an issue. As of last week, the app keeps switching to French and no matter how many times I click the English option and save (i have to Google how to change the language setting, since its not even possible to find thr setting in app), it either half translates or doesn't save my preference. The desktop site has my preference saved. I am in Quebec, so maybe has something to do with it, but this is beyond frustrating to deal with.

The app version (7/22/22) is slower than any before it! Why would you move a drop down menu from the top that had been there for years and put it on the bottom and it's not a coherent menu, it's horizontal choices you have to scroll along with big pictures? Any menu items on an older phone take almost a whole minute to come up! TO CONVOLUTED!

Display is still not optimized for small screens and zooming in for details and trying to look around requires permanent touch with two fingers - if it works at all. Handling is irritating if you are used to a real computer for browsing and shopping. Filters lack precision (spamming you with amazons choices but not what you searched for) and options (no functional filter by price). Warning: will NOT require re-authentications. Whoever has access to your phone can do anything !

If you shop on your phone, Amazon offers 2 coupons if you download the app: one coupon for first purchase, and as a coupon for second purchase. When you download the app and press to get the coupon, it says, "coupon unlocked", but there is never a discount that appears off your order. I have tried this twice, so again I'm deleting this app. I don't recommend it, because it's just as easy to shop on your phone without the app.

So sick of "you have this much time to order and have it arrive this date" just to have it switch to a later date too early even for very very expensive items that are definitely not being sold to the point that stock would be an issue so I know that excuse is just a bald faced lie. It's always within a few minutes of adding it to my cart that it changes. Same with prices going up right after adding to your cart after being a lower price for so long. Amazon tracks your cart and rips you off.

Ever since the new update, the app will randomly shut down, freeze, lag, and cause me to restart my phone. I can't make two clicks without an issue. This is horribly frustrating. The app is up to date, I've cleared the cache multiple times. I've restarted my phone countless times. I have never been this frustrated with this app. PLEASE FIX IT.

I hate that this is a system app on my phone and can't be uninstalled. I don't want to use it, I don't want to shop online with this phone anyways, and it's using up storage space for no reason on a very low storage phone. Plus it opens up if I accidentally tap an add, which is very easy to do, and then uses more of my already poor quality internet connection, and doesn't let me leave the app easily! Even if I liked Amazon, I wouldn't like this app.

This new update has made the app terrible as far as user friendly. You can no longer quickly check what has shipped, lists or any shortcut that was previously found with the 3 lines at the bottom of the page. Now it is a bunch of useless stuff that I will never use. Order history (when I could find it) has been reduced to 3 months. I pay for "prime" but that's just a term. Shipping is just whenever, and free returns is only if you get lucky. Sort by price is a joke.

Freezes constantly when utilizing the Wish Lists feature. It's been like this for years at this point; same on every phone I've ever had it on. Trying to change priority of list items/move them to diff lists is a huge pain in the butt, to the point where I usually don't even bother w/ it unless it's really important. Even when it doesn't freeze, it always lags ridiculously when opening the drop-down menus and selecting on that. Then it has bouts of lagging/freezing while just browsing the lists.

This app wouldn't update and I would constantly get notifications that it would work better with the update. So after a month I decided to Uninstal and re-download as a chance for it to update properly. The app now refuses to re-download and it's been over 2 weeks. I've sent constant feedback to Amazon and Samsung and nothing has been done. I've restarted my phone, updated everything but no progress.

Loved this app until everything just disappeared from it with no warning. My Wish Lists, Recent Orders, Search History, everything. Gone. I'm mostly upset about my gift card balance disappearing. I read on Google that this can happen if you accidentally have 2 accounts with the same email and different passwords but I haven't logged in or out of my Amazon account ever since I got the app. It's been logged in the whole time so I definitely do not have 2 accounts. I'm lost. How do I fix this???

I don't want to watch your videos. You have made it so that the app will not scroll if I touch a video. This causes many of these terrible attempts at peddling some outsourced garbage to pop up to full screen, when I don't want it to. This is the sort of poor functionality that will cause me to remove the app, and subsequently my prime subscription. Update: I would also like to be able to filter by country of origin. If that's too much, just have a filter to exclude results from China.

It's hard finding clothing that's a good quality, and when you look up "gifts for mom"and stuff like that, it shows a very generalized and non-variety of items to purchase. And I hate the whole thing where every single recommended item is just something I've already clicked on. It's not recommended if I just clicked on it and decided against it. Why is there no real recommendations? And lastly..... Very slow, very glitchy. But has the most stuff compared to other apps ig.....

I don't experience a lot of crashing, but I do experience freezing and extended loading times (upwards of 30 seconds) pretty regularly. I'd like to be able to customize my home feed, because I am ZERO PERCENT interested in most of that content. Especially livestreams, which is a laughable concept to me. It's messy, cluttered and becoming a backwards app.

As if things couldn't get worse, the older version now refuses to work unless you update to this new garbage. Nothing is laid out sensibly, loading every page is so SLOW, and there's always a little Alexa button in the corner you can't get rid of, even if it's turned off. You're better off using the browser page over this TRASH. A tip for anyone with the old version, if you go into airplane mode before you open the app and turn it off once it opens it prevents the annoying update loop.

Absolutely hate the new product galleries!!!! I hate how far down you have to scroll, that was the worst update they could have done. One gallery slider section was perfect. I absolutely hate scrolling all the way to the bottom of every single imagine and giant description section just to get to the reviews or similar items., it's too much to look at and a waste of cellular data loading all of that mess. Used to be perfect!

Great app for everything Amazon. That said, enables 1-click purchases availability by default. Just accidentally bought digital content without being told how much it would cost total or what card would be used. Not showing up in orders to "cancel" or refund. Settings -> 1-Click Settings -> Disable EDIT: Was very quickly able to resolve the issue with contacting customer service and was offered a full refund on the spot. Updating from 2* to 3*

So firstly, I have an Amazon account. I have prime, and use their services. But this app seems like it's malware ridden or something. I downloaded the app and almost immediately my phone began to glitch out. Sometimes I would open Google and Amazon would open instead. The ad blockers I have installed stopped working, and my phone would stop receiving or making calls when the app was active. My solution in the end was a factory reset, and the issues stopped. Do not get this app.

The app works okay for now. However, based on the experience with Amazon removing functionality and charging extra for it (like they did with Photos, and now in Nov 2022 with Music). Simple things like playing a specific song now cost extra, it will only play songs "similar" to for the fee we already pay. Expect bad decisions like this to come to the Amazon shopping app.

**Update: gave app another try, STILL TRASH.** Deleted due to bugs that prevent use of essential functions. Can't select "my orders", "buy again" or several other actions: every time you try to select them, you get the "Return to home screen" pop up. Unable to start a return on the app due to this and had to go to the full website on a computer. A bit scummy that the app is bugging in a way that makes it impossible to do anything other than shopping and ordering items. App crashes frequently.

Keeps switching to French! Very frustrating. I keep having to switch it back to English. Also, some features and instructions are only accessible in French. Tried to get help, almost impossible to find how to chat with someone. Once I finally clicked through all the automated messages and menus and found a chat, waited and waited.... No one there to support. Very disappointed. Very poor customer service for such a huge and profitable company.

I love Amazon, but I hate this app. Slow, clunky, keyboards cover important details, can't sort... I use it when it's all I have, but I avoid this mobile app as much as possible. It works, but It's amazing to me with how much time and money at they're disposal, they still have one of the worst company apps available. It makes me leave items in my cart so I can look at them better on PC... This is worse than the History channel's streaming app, haha. Hard to top, but somehow Amazon managed.

I have had no problems from Amazon for years since I've been shopping. I am an international shopper and I always get the right product, good quality despite my waiting time. Recently, however, I have a problem viewing my shopping cart. I will either have to change my password which does not work, or I will have to uninstall and reinstall the app which is inconvenient. I hope someone is able to fix that issue.

Since a recent update, I can barely stand the search results because now they AUTOPLAY the images. I look to those images to tell whether I want to click on the result or not, but if I only got 2 seconds to tell what it is, how does that benefit anyone? This is pure "fixing what isn't broken" example; way worse than what I've seen Microsoft do. For the love of God, at least let me turn it off! If I could guess, it's decreased my chance of buying anything by 30% out of frustration.

Amazon, you are circling the drain. The version installed on my phone cannot be altered, uninstalled or accessable to any settings or preferences. My icon shows a brown box with the trademark smile on my Motorola phone. My old Galaxy that I use for books and data has the old regular app with the shopping cart. How about you quit selling me more of something that doesn't interest me (what ARE you doing with my algorithms?!?) and focus on what I have ordered.

Sometime in the last couple months my phone started getting pop up ads every friggin single time I turned it on. I HATE POP UP ADS!!! Had I known downloading this app would cause that, I never would have installed it. Amazon's site says you can pay to remove them. Hahaha!!! Are you kidding?? Nope!! I just installed the app instead. No more pop ups! Problem solved! It's easy enough to go to Amazon thru my browser instead.

The app crashes way too often. No exaggeration...every time I try to edit items on my wishlist, the app freezes and shuts down. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it several times. I've restarted my phone. I've made sure to update the app every time an update is available. It's very annoying. I love Amazon. I'd say the app is very convenient, but not when it crashes all the time.

App is unresponsive a lot of times. When shopping for a specific sized item that isn't typically listed on the main page, I try selecting "view all options" for said item and it just jumps me right back to the top of the page and won't open the "view all options" page at all. Viewing product images is sub par at best. You have to swipe 100 times before it will actually go to the next image, and a lot of times it'll skip right over multiple images. Super frustrating!!!

I really like Amazon's service and their logistics are really cool. The app on the other hand needs to narrow filters, there's too many unrelated results that a quick search becomes a half hour task. All those spam results is what prevents me from getting Amazon prime so that I don't fall into buying things I don't really need or that are just risky and low quality. Anyway, kudos to the developers and delivery staff.

Watch/delete your payment methods you have saved on your Amazon Prime account/wallet. They have made it a habit to charge a saved account a small, random amount of money, and call it an "authorization charge" for an order, even though the account charged wasn't the account used to place the order, AND the order had already been paid for, shipped, and received over a week ago. This makes twice now for me. They think they are being sneaky!

I was forced to update; the old version said "no longer supported", but after installing the latest version, I was able to make just ONE order, before it started giving me a black screen, when I selected "my orders". Then, as I navigated around the app, it suddenly froze, then about 30 seconds later, crashed, disappearing completely, and returned me to the play store! Why???

The app no longer works for me (and many others) since a few months ago, with pages loading for a few seconds before getting redirected to a "something went wrong" message. Yes, I have gone through all the troubleshooting steps laid out for this issue on the forums and if someone gives me the same list of steps again I may just give up on Amazon altogether. The issue appears to do with DNS ad blockers, and this is THE ONLY app I use that has any problem with them and used to work fine.

Loved it until a couple of weeks ago when suddenly everything is now in Spanish instead of English! I have to keep tapping "Translate" for each page, even though I have my settings on ENGLISH. Even my order confirmation email was in Spanish! I've tried several times to get them to correct it, but with no success. I'm SO frustrated with this, and VERY disappointed in what had been a wonderful app...especially since I'm disabled and need to use Amazon for most of my shopping.

The shopping experience on Amazon continues to deteriorate. Amazon is trying too aggressively to tell my preferences, so it just won't show all that is available. Plus the same item comes up over and over from different sellers. Additionally half of all *l"results" are sponsored ads. I am no longer shopping around in the app or on the site. It's a frustrating waste of time to find what you are looking for. Plus there are endless products that don't match images or descriptions. Amazon is dying.

The issues started shortly after downloading the app today. Shortly after signing in and briefly using the app, I was on a call and a clock alarm went off, but the alarm couldn't be turned off. Restarted and several of the folders, widgets, and shortcuts on my home screens were gone. Yes, gone! I had them there for a reason! Restarted again. Still gone. And again. Still gone! What's the use of an app if it messes with your phone that way? "Disappointed" is an understatement. Uninstalled.

I remember back when below an item there used to be a row of items that were similar to what you were looking at. Now there are 4 or 5 rows throughout the description and they are all sponsored or made by Amazon. I feel they are pushing certain items or brands instead of letting us see all our options. It's frustrating. And I'm not liking the new filters (when they work), and it doesn't tell you how many items are in the result list anymore. Not user friendly at all. UPDATE- it's getting better

Every log-on, I am asked by Amazon if I want to join PRIME. After declining several hundred times, you might think, Amazon would get a clue. Until they do get a clue, I am doing my primary shopping somewhere else. Also, the new app is NOT better. I just have to get used to it again to find all the options because the designers think moving the buttons to different locations on the screen makes it look better.

Used to be great, but now mostly unreliable now. Mid point of my overall opinion. The search doesn't clear or is delayed. My orders, lists etc anything on my personal account are not showing up and I keep getting an error message. EVEN with the update. Even with clearing data on my phone. On the plus side, I can order as much stuff as I want and get same, next, or 2 day shipping. And free returns (up to 90 days mostly) if it's not right bc I can't reorder or make sure I haven't over-ordered.

What on earth did you do to this app?! The new search filters are absolute trash. It is so much more difficult to narrow things down properly, and everything is much more broad. Example: Men's Pants for fit type there is now only straight, loose, fitted. Where is the athletic, slim, bootcut, etc etc. Also the whole left/right column look just really doesn't look good at all. Though the old version did have some flaws, it was way better than this UI. You could have just improved on what you had!

Shopping with Amazon is fine. I enjoy it and the Prime feature helps a lot. Also fairly easy to navigate. I would have given one or two more stars if the list feature worked better. I don't know what you guys did, but when adding an item to a list it no longer lets me edit so that I can add to certain lists. So I add a camera, for example, to a shoes list and no ability to change this. That's annoying that I cannot properly and orderly categorize anything anymore.

I decided to remove the music & shopping app from my android. In the past, they were great. This year, the quality has gone down, as has the price competitiveness. The shopping app told me I can no longer purchase music on my phone (no idea why) & this being the latest issue, along with not being allowed to review my purchases (I purchase items almost every day), I've decided to price comparison & go with locals when possible. As for music, if I continue to have issues, may default to others.

I love amazon. It's my go to for everything. From clothing to art supplies to electronics to food. It really has something for everyone . I only wish that the preference for how items searched for are listed could be personalized. I hate having to click the filter and select priced low to high EVERY time I search. Another complaint is my phone only lets me view, maybe 8 items a page. It is very time consuming.

This app has gone from functional to barely functioning over the last few months. It used to run fine, but now it takes forever to load, and it's always erroring and unable to load. Absolute hot garbage. It's supposed to be convenient, but is only frustrating because of how poorly it works, when it works. Even with a strong WiFi connection, it's unable to connect and load anything.

The amount of content in terms of videos and ads is high. It used to be relatively fast. Shopping was an easy experience. Over the years, it's become bloated, and much less convenient. In terms of usability, finding account options ranges from easy to ridiculously difficult. There's a sea of menus, with what seems like hundreds of options buried in them. It would be a huge improvement if Amazon were to simplify and streamlined account options.

Stop asking me to enable Alexa. I don't want to use Alexa, and there's no way to turn off the CONSTANT reminders that it's not enabled. The app is OK for quick orders, but being nagged every ten seconds to enable a service I DON'T WANT is annoying. Navigation within the app is not intuitive, and Amazon keeps moving things, so as soon as you figure out where to find something (like your gift card balance), it changes and you're right back to square one. The website is not much better.

I have yet to had a great experience with amazon. Almost every order has had something gone wrong with it and I've had way to many technical issues to my liking. Can't even use my cart anymore as the site doesn't let me past shipping. The customer support are very slow and most of the time seem like they don't read what you're typing and miss the issue. Only after long conversations is the issue delt with (If at all) My friends have a good experiences with amazon but I can't say the same.

For as big as Amazon is, the app is seriously lacking! App options are overly complicated, and its ridiculous that orders and returns arent in separate places. I hate having to scroll through orders to find returns. It would be nice to be able to see each return and whether you received the refund or not. Also, whatever intelligence used for search results is awful. If I search for "blue long dress" I get every color and length...Amazon can do better!

Amazon is great, the App is not!! The filter process is absolutely horrible and it shows a lot of irrelevant things. When you send email updates on orders, why can't you mention the item names or include picture of those items in that email body itself that is being referred to in that particular email. That will help a lot. The emails are useless if they dont say what items they are referring to.

I can usually find what I'm looking for at a reasonable price. I don't like that it gives you one price on shipping, which may change on checkout. I also don't like that it will give you a delivery date, that becomes a different delivery date, only after you have completed your order and checkout! Amazon also doesn't give enough options for bad reviews, leaving the blame to anyone else, giving themselves a scapegoat for having to replace an item.

I love Amazon but this app needs A LOT of work. It freezes every few seconds the ENTIRE time I try using it. It makes me not even want to shop because it take hours to get anything to load and especially when you are trying to read reviews and look at customers pictures with their review. It is impossible to shop around with it crashing and freezing every few seconds. The updates are making it worse each time. Now I keep getting an "Amazon is not responding" message and kicks me out repeatedly.

Since the latest updates, this app struggles to let me see my orders. It's very frustrating to try and view your orders (or even the status of your order) and the app just constantly flickers for 5 or more minutes. I don't have the patience to wait any longer than that so I just close it completely. Please find a fix soon. Seems like the membership is going up but other areas (including multiple lost packages) have seemed to diminish. C'mon Amazon don't lose your glory.

Horrible algorithm, you have to know exactly how to search to find what you want, and your home page will be filled with the most useless items for you. It crashes, loads slow, bugs, and is generally inconvenient. Also they keep updating what the app looks like and every time it gets uglier and more inconvenient. The orders page has changed so my past orders and current are all combined and mixed making my orders extremely hard to visualize.

Ever since the update about a month ago this is the worst app ever, and so frustrating. Ridiculously slow. I could go to my computer and log in before this app loads its pages. Buttons have been moved to the bottom, which is not a big deal, but that's when the app somehow got really slow. Alexa button is always present and in the way even if you've disabled alexa. I've already switched to other stores for shopping, solely because it's no longer easy to shop Amazon with the new app versions.

I've been using Amazon for years. However recently their customer service has really tanked. They are rude, ignorant and over all make it very difficult to return things and get your money back. This is very depressing cause it's impossible to tell if something will fit, since all size 2, 5 ,10 are NOT the same. So if you can't try it on and return it without dealing with rude individuals what's the point of ordering stuff from them when they claim how easy it is to return things.

With a recent update, the orders page now refreshes every time you return to it, which makes checking on your orders tedious and confusing. The cart page is buggy now too, often taking you to a recent search instead of to your cart. And half the time when you tap in the search field to edit a search, it clears the field instead. When you're trying to read a product page, there's a floating back-to-top button right in the middle of your view. Usability was never great but it keeps getting worse.

The new app doesn't work with my old phone anymore, so I had to Uninstall it and tried to install it in my new phone (which is the latest version of Samsung) still have problems, but it doesn't download, but before that had issues with the app very slow and other major problems. They should have stayed with the old app there were no issues or problems at all or at least for me, so they go from 4 stars to 1 stars.

Useful but broken. The 'my orders' screen does not load a majority of the time, it just gets stuck / frozen. This makes reordering items, handling returns, checking order status, and sharing product links all much more difficult than it has to be. It's been broken for months, and I've reported the bug previously with no response. I place many more orders than most people probably, which may be why I have the problem. FYI there is a workaround, you can go to 'buy again' and search for the order

The latest update made searching for specific items difficult! I tried to give it a few weeks and see if i just needed time to get used to it, but no it does suck! Search results are broad and fairly unrelated to what I'm actually searching for. Trying the filter isn't much help either. Trying to filter by brand still shows cheap knock-offs an look-alikes. Trying to filter by price range shows expensive look-alikes and SPONSORED items, like you're trying to HIDE the items i actually want to buy!

Uhh... at some point, it wanted to charge me $60 more on top of the $90 worth of items I was going to purchase. No thanks. App is a little confusing too. Hoping amazon could have set prices for the items being sold instead of the range of numbers like ($20-$45) or says it's $2 but when you click on the product, it turns into $16. Stuff like that.

2nd review, first got deleted. Hhmm, wonder why. App won't work. Tried downloading an update cause the app wouldn't work without it, It downloads %100 goes to install, then says it can't install. So I deleted the app to reinstall it, same thing, now I don't have the app at all. I have space, can still download other things. Amazon you lost a customer. Edit: I read other reviews, I think the update was the full vid adds. My phones older. I see this a bullet dodged. Not coming back to this app

It was great, I used it all the time for buying things I can't get locally. Even subed to prime for quite a while. Then several items I ordered were delivered to the wrong addresses. Tracking showed that someone requested to have the address changed to one in NJ or NYC. I tried calling the shipper and they refused to change it back. Amazon refunded me, but then my debit card info was stolen. My bank was able to find who used it, and let me know that they got it from my Amazon account.

I have really been having a hard time with Amazon here lately. The shipping has been absolutely atrocious. They also make it impossible to leave feedback about anything. Now they've also blocked the talk to text option on everything. I use that constantly.... It's the only app it won't work on. I'm not sure why. Honestly, it's so corporate, It's impossible to get help if it doesn't just work perfectly for you.

PLEASE STOP moving and reconfiguring the account and orders functions in this app. Rearranging everything is a terrible practice in UX. I feel like once a month you guys have a new UX person take the lead and they feel like they need to make a mark quickly so they just rearrange everything. I would not be surprised if I found the rectangle buttons replaced with triangles and all of the text in upside down comic sans. Please PLEASE stop.

Can we get rid of the Alexa button in the lower right hand corner. The placing is terribly inconvenient as most people are right handed and tend to hit it will trying to scroll. At least give me the option to turn it off. Also the revised menu set ups aren't great and the app seems buggy now. Please stop trying to fix what isn't broken, it just makes the experience worse.

Junk auto play in search results. Junk junk junk. It's unusable for me. Can't look at a product and decide if that's what I'm looking for. Also I don't like that this junk that I can't turn off is using up data on my cellphone plan. I don't plan on doing any shopping at Amazon until it's changed. On a side note I tried the mobile website and it's the same on there as well. Amazon must have thought doing this to their site they would increase sales. Just the opposite is happening in my case.

Surprisingly annoying to use. Struggled to find my list after liking several items. I ordered an item. An hour later, I realised I used the wrong shipping address. Even though the order hadn't been shipped, I was unable to edit the address. The customer service prompts just sent me back to the same uneditable page. I canceled the order. I couldn't simply reorder the item and couldn't find the same one again. Ended up buying the same thing at a higher price.

It functions, but as I am browsing products I would much rather do it on my browser as the app does not allow me to open more tabs, thus limiting me to only looking at one product at a time. When I have multiple tabs I can easily flip between a few products I am interested in to compare them. I really only keep the app around in case I need to talk to customer service.

They just updated the app so that when you go to shop and you look up a product it autoplays a video on every. single. product. And when you go to click on the product that you may be interested in, it starts blasting the product video. I was advised there is no way to turn this off unless I also wanted to stop autoplay on my Amazon prime videos. Which means that if I were watching a show it would not autoplay the next episode. I fail to understand why these two would be linked.

It has even less functionality than the mobile version of Amazon's web portal, which is hard to believe ... I have literally never bought anything on Amazon without first having to switch to desktop/pc mode, since the mobile site lacks sufficient sorting & filter capabilities. I tried the app because Amazon offered a $20 coupon if I used it for a purchase, but there's no clue how you access the coupon and in searching for items to buy, I kept getting the error with the basset hound image.

AND......with all the rotten reviews, i have disabled this app as i have no option to completely delete it from my phone or the universe! I only use my desktop for shopping/buying: more power and better ability to control what's going on. What a waste of brain power with phone apps! 3/4's of what is on my phone I've either removed or disabled. ANYWAY......we all pay good money to be driven crazy, so just trying to stay in control to avoid a crash & burn!

They keep changing the app, making it confusing and hard to navigate. For example, to get to my Subscribed items, do I click on Subscribe & Save from the main menu, the way it was done before? No, that would be much too simple and logical!!! Instead I find the much smaller Account option buried in a drop down menu, click that, then click Your Subscribed Items. Honestly, I'd rather shop at AliExpress -- it's Chinese, but less confusing than Amazon -- and I don't speak Chinese.

I've had a prime membership for 10 years, and I love Amazon. I really want to give the Amazon Shopping app 5 stars, but I can't. It's BAD! And it keeps getting worse over time. I purchase items on Amazon to get good products at a good, competitive, price, so I use filters. But they are useless!!! You can't specify your own price range and putting price in the description doesn't work at all. The other filters results are so inaccurate, they're worthless and keep getting worse. That's why 1 star.

EDIT: The following seem to have been fixed and app has been running smoothly for the last couple of months. Previously there were issues with freezing and crawling SO SLOWLY. It used to work fine for <30 minutes, then it was back to crawling/freezing. Felt like a denial of service attack. Was unable to edit my lists. I'm glad it's fixed. Here's to hoping you can keep the wrinkles ironed out and the app stays in working order.

Search results are almost useless, even when searching a specific term, e.g. 18650 battery there will be both sponsored products and regular results that do not match, and the search doesn't allow boolean modifiers to narrow results. The new UI, specifically for filtering, is just abhorrent; it fills the entire screen, the category tree is no longer clear, it kicks you out to search results every time you make a refinement, and you have less options for filtering.

SO SLOW! I love Amazon in general, but this app is so slow and tedious, it's almost unusable! It's especially tedious to add items to your wishlists, which I do frequently. Additionally, if you want to move items to another list or delete several items, it takes forever as you can't select multiple items at once and you can only edit one item at a time. There's no way to bulk edit your saved items at all. When you're editing a lot of items, it's beyond frustrating because it takes FOREVER!

So many issues with this app and it seems to get worse with every update. I don't know what is going on with the people updating this app, but what you're doing is making me want to just get rid of Amazon all together. Example: moving stuff in my list, the app crashes, freezes and puts items in other lists. Searching for items, the app crashes as well. The searches are not consistent with the results and trying to filter the search eliminates items that shouldn't be.

Can't view recent purchases page. It just keeps refreshing and nothing really loads. I've even tried reinstalling to see if it fixes it, but nope. I thought maybe it was just a bad update, but it's been like this for months now, without a fix. Do better, Amazon. All these other things that don't even matter are on the main page, but we can't even view recent purchases anymore.

my phone did an updated then the app disappears, does not show up anywhere on the phone... go to the app store and it has an enable button, it does not work! It is stuck, It never changes from enable... I get a quick look at the update choice and then right back to the enable screen! I can't delete what does not show up so I can't reload the app.

Would give this app a 4 or 5 star as use it all the time, apart from amazon sign in system, where you have too change your password every time you sign into the app, online it's perfect, signs in every time, but for some reason, I can't seem too sign into the my other account, as apparently I forgot my password. ( when I didn't) as works online. I understand that amazon consider this as a safety feature, but it's not a safety if it doesn't work properly. But if it wasn't for this issue, 4 or 5*

Worst search engine. Can't give you what you are looking for because it doesn't give you exact matches. You can order the wrong item because of similar items mixed in with your search. A painfully long search, hours, can find the right item at a good price. Buying directly off the web at another might be better at finding exactly what you want for a slightly higher price. Basicaly you buy whatever shows up first.

Paid for prime tried shopping but Amazon refuses to ship anything I'm in Tampa. Every time I try and order something they never ship it. They will send you notifications like it's on its way then nothing. I have 3 orders canceled for failure to even ship the product. Different vendors Different products same result. Amazon has horrible customer service. All they said was wait longer or shop somewhere else. I'm not exaggerating. I wish I took a screen shot. I don't have a single good thing to say

Amazon please fix your app. It can become incredibly buggy to the point where the app has even closed on me. Another thing would be the search engine. I can look up something and get something entirely different. I'm sure if i looked up circles on your engine it would give me squares. Even the filters don't work right. Example. If i choose the filter "Physical Copy" it literally also chooses the "Playstation 4" filter on top of it. Why? I chose "Physical Copy" so why can't i get what i chose?

UI is constantly changing, leading to a disjointed experience with the app. "Orders" page is constantly buggy, often not loading. Several times I have had delivery personel deliver packages by throwing it at my door... never enough packaging in the boxes, and sometimes the thin paper tape is torn or not put on properly to seal the box. Returns are confusing, and they make you drive to a Whole Foods or a participating UPS store to make a return when they screw something up... highly frustrating.

HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. I ended up paying for a free subscription that Amazon offered. Initially,I was told by a agent what the issue was, but they would follow up with a resolution, and to not cancel. They never followed up.I did and kept being transferred from agent to agent. 10+ agents later, I was hung up on multiple times and agents disconnected from chats. If your clueless just say that, then find me someone that can help. I reached out on all platforms, no resolution,so I cancelled!!!

Idk what happened but it freezes, takes forever to load or let me move pictures to check out items. it's NOT my phone since every other app including Prime TV and Freevee work just fine. Phone has full bars and my wifi is connected full too. I even reloaded the app, restarted my phone, so it the app and not my phone. It makes it difficult to shop and buy especially for Christmas.

I just placed an order of at least 5 items and Amazon canceled my order because the payment option was apparently not good even though it didn't detect that when placing the order! So now it says I have to place a new order but I have no idea which version of these items I had in my cart - Amazon doesn't send a list of items in the confirmation email, the order is not in my history, and only 2 items are in my browsing history. I spent hours reading reviews! Why not put them back in my cart?!!

I'm really o.k. with a lot of its FEATURES. I changed my provider & that's causing issues. I do have ideas for improvements for those NON technical people. I like it. Wish u could select items from your basket or list, then only purchase the few things u want. Without having 2 do it the current system of putting stuff in the main cart or in a list. Hope it makes sense?

Slow and unusable. I have a galaxy note 9 . Everything else on my phone runs great. Amazon app searches take minutes to complete if they complete at all. Most of the time i gett an oops message. I spend a fair chunk of cash each month with them. If this app remains this way much longer i will look elsewhere for goods. As slow as it is its unusable. My phone is my only internet access so fix it or i cannot use your service. This is just the main bug out of a dozen other issues...

Issues since the 11/25/22 Update. Now when I attempt to go to view my Past Orders. It takes me to the screen loads the in app links but the orders never load and the load bar just rapidly flashes. I have to close the app completely to remedy the issue. This happens everytime I attempt to view previous orders. Friends and family have spoken of the same issue since the last update. Lastly and extremely annoying. Now when you search for an item. The Videos and even ads start automatically!

I haven't had nearly the same trouble with bugs as some people are having, but I still see the "There was an error on our end" page way too much. My main inconvenience is ordering things that boast, (Buy in this amount of time to get it tomorrow) and 3 days later, I'm alerted that it was just shipped. I don't even know if Amazon is to blame, but police your sellers or something. Prime isn't worth paying for if it has no advantages over using the free version.

Until this last update I have had zero issues with this app. However now, even after clearing cache, data, uninstalling and reinstalling, the app will not allow me to access my account information, has lost my saved addresses and so on. Normally this wouldn't bother me however being able to make orders on the fly while traveling or st work etc is the one major convenience this app offers. Its quite redundant without it. Please fix this. No point to the app if its only fully functional on my PC.

I used to use Amazon for everything, until their app became so slow and unbelievably frustrating. It takes forever to load, will freeze up, or just send me to a blank screen. The important filters are gone, you really don't know who you're ordering from. My husband purchased some clothes only to find out it would take two months for everything to arrive! Stupid ads for stuff I don't need and wasn't looking for everywhere. Amazon is failing hard.

App has become the worst version of itself that I've ever experienced. Always crashing and lagging, product videos will go to black screen and never play. Cart button goes to a product and not cart. Lots of issues. I'm not going to write a book about them. My experience with Amazon Shopping has become labored and tedious. I sincerely hope they get things back to before the newest update.

Amazon has gone so downhill in the last year or so. Items are almost always delivered late. When they're delivered at all. I've had so many "Undeliverable" items (I live close to the city, not a rural area) and then refunds are never issued until you call them. Poor quality items. Poor delivery. Everything that used to be good about Amazon isn't anymore.

When it works, it works, but I have to give it 2 stars because it periodically needs to be uninstalled and reinstalled to work properly. One day, I'll open the app and all my data is gone, wish list, history, gift card balance, etc. I can see that stuff fine if I log in using my PC, but that defeats the purpose of having the app. The only way to get it to work properly again is to reinstall it to finally retrieve my data. And it's issue with multiple devices (Tab S2, Tab S3, Pixel 3a).

Prime orders always give a "guaranteed" delivery date but completely miss it about half the time when Amazon Logistics is used for the delivery (which you can't choose to avoid). Then you have to spend 30 minutes on the phone with them to get any kind of restitution, if any, for their failure. How is this a guarantee? False advertising? Amazon used to have the best service. Not any more. Now you can't buy books on the app! Uninstalling.

The new update is enough to just stop using Amazon altogether! Its maddening! If I could give 0 I would. The home/cart tabs being moved to the bottom so they are in line with my (and most phones) function bar.... Whoever thought of that needs to be fired!! Recent purchases not working, the app has never registered the actual product I click on, but now its way worse. The only thing you got right was adding the scrolling add to cart-but at the expense of everything wrong, it wasnt worth it!!

For the past MONTH the app everytime it launches will start to load properly but then go to a fail screen saying it needs an update to run, the auto launches a web page that says the same thing. HOWEVER no matter what I do it won't update! It will download and start to install and then fail and Google Play will just say 'your app was unable to update' I'm just so tired of this!!!

This app was wonderful without any issues before this recent update. I can't filter search items from low to high as every item and its prices are randomized. Also, it keeps glitching for every action. It's always failing to search anything, to look at a item I press, and even to checkout. Its gotten so frustrating to the point where I haven't bought anything from Amazon these past two weeks. I've decided to get a Walmart plus membership and buy the items I need from there.

I've ordered from the app several times. The first time was ok. There after has been terrible! I have specific instructions on my account, "drop off at front door," because I don't order unless I'm home. Several time the packages were left anywhere, I live in an apartment complex, not good. The app is buggy and extremely slow and I receive all types of error messages. Will most likely delete the app. Now I'm having issues trying to delete my account!

The app is great, despite a few glitches. The accounts system makes it hard to follow purchases and returns. The Amazon service is still very good but no longer outstanding. Without being a Prime member delivery is poor yet the increase to £8.99/month for this is a bit much when I add up the huge amount I spend with them. I will use them because of their remarkable choice but I will start looking elsewhere, not least to keep other businesses in business.

Suddenly in Android 13 the app is always running and doesn't need to be. I AM capable of tapping an icon to start an app in case you were confused about that. Visually unappealing. Bottom menus are not intuitive, a roadblock to use and difficult to access for many people with joint issues in their fingers. So thanks for making an app with a terrible color scheme that is literally physically painful to use.

Horrible algo for filters. The results are unrelated. The filters don't even work. You apply a filter for a price range and it shows products higher or lower too. The filters sucks and makes it so hard to navigate and look for a desired product. I don't understand why Amazon can't work on this feature and make it smooth and useful for the user.

They relentlessly push you to sign up for Amazon Prime, so much so that you need to be very careful when navigating through a purchase. Recently, when I was placing an order, I inadvertently clicked on a button that appeared to complete the transaction. Unknowingly, it signed me up for Amazon Prime. I reached out to Amazon to let them know I didn't want Prime. I made several attempts via the app and email to cancel the transaction and subscription. It took over 10 steps to finally cancel.

For a long time, I used my web browser for Amazon because I thought there was no app for Amazon Smile. I was pleasantly surprised to learn you can turn it on as a feature in the app. Now it's my go to for using Amazon. I'd like to give it a higher score, there's a few flaws. Sometimes the product comparison page just disappears, like a glitch. And the app doesn't seem to have a secure sign-in. Password, biometric, something instead of just opening my account with a tap. ✌️&❤️

The option to save item to shopping list is not at all visible. I always struggle to find it. Is it that hard to have a favourites / heart button? Also, when I search for something and change the sort by option from the default 'featured' to 'price from low', for example, I get less items (like half as many). This is sorting, not filtering. Bug right there! Also, would be great to have the option to sort by number of reviews (from most reviewed to less).

The live video feature on the deals page is slowing the app down. The feature is on autoplay. The only way to shut this feature off is to click on the live video and pause it then exit the video. Please add an option to disable autoplay. This would make the app a little more user friendly and prevent data loss for those not connected to wifi. Some users may like the live video. It is fine to have it on by default or even have a want to join the live steam bar for redesign. But let users choose.

An ok app for customers with vulnerabilities that make it great for hackers. Many hackers utilize a feature on Amazon to "archive" an order, which hides the order from the "orders" section so you can't see it. There is literally NO way to see archived orders on the app, you have to log in on the desktop site and go through several steps to get there. The message center isn't on the home page and Amazon sometimes send messages there you wouldn't see otherwise, found this out after getting hacked.

My family has always ordered from amazon. So I created my own account. I believe I have ordered 10 items so far and only received 8. A 10$ item which I only received a empty plastic envelope and was more hassle to argue with them over. So I let it go. But the second item was a $500-600$ item. And they keep telling me it was delivered. Which yes a package was delivered but only 2 out of 3 items were in the box. But there's nothing they can do. They basically stole my money. Amazon is Unreliable.

This app is worthless from the search bar. It's shows you all of the sponsored content, but not what you're actually searching for. The app used to be good, but now it's useless. Even if you use the filters, the labels on the filters are also useless, and don't help you pinpoint what you're searching for. I am so annoyed by this app that I seldom actually take the time to go find products that I want. This issue should be dealt with. Amazon, your app*ukking sukkz. Pls fix it.

Since the update the app says my address fors not exist and I had to change the address. I called customer service and it wasn't showing on their end, even tho I have had things delivered to my residence forever. Had to update the billing address, and then change it back. It's correct on one screen and not the other. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app and placed the order, but I have no idea if the payment will go thru because the billing addresses are different on the screens.

The ONE thing tech companies are supposed to be laser focused on is getting people to buy stuff. Amazon can't even get that right. Someone sent me a direct Amazon product link, and even though the app is supposed to handle a.co URLs, it wouldn't open the one I got. Searching for the product by its exact ID, which has always worked in a browser, shows me a full screen of ads for other products, with repeated popups encouraging me to ask Alexa random mundane questions. Just let me spend my money!

Literally every time I used the app on my old phone, I'd be searching and clicking through the options, and a "Sorry, something went wrong" message came up, which then makes you reload everything and try again. Got a brand new phone this year, works slightly better, but still get the message constantly. Very annoying when it's every other search or click, and it's been like this for long enough that I think a fix is past due.

The app has difficulty loading just about everything. I have a Galaxy S22, at home, new router and modem. My wireless devices all work fine. Other apps load in fine. It's the Amazon app. It's purely and only the Amazon app. Even after clearing caches it still takes forever to load anything. It even has trouble playing downloaded songs. This is a daily problem, too. Amazon is one of the biggest and wealthiest companies and it can't even get its own music app to work. Disgraceful.

Very disappointed. When I select any item particularly tshirt of gents, and select the size, immediately the screen shows "currently unavailable". Then what is the use of this app if no products are available with them ?? The moment I select "buy now" option, it shows currently unavailable. Simply for Wasting time of customers, such apps are developed. If the product is unavailable, right from the moment we select the product they need to show it's unavailable.It's not the first or second time.

***UPDATE*** I did almost all of my Christmas 🎄 shopping on this app and I was mostly presently surprised. Orderimg was great. Tracking was great. One of the few concerns I had was i had to keep checking the shipping addresses each package was supposed to be shipped to because it kept changing and I didn't like that. Based on reviews, I regretfully will not be installing this app until improvements are made. It's unfortunate because I have some serious shopping to do!

This app use to be fine no problems with it, then around 3 months ago I feel something has changed. It's terrible now. When you try to check your orders to be able to track delivery updates the app just sticks & says "oops there seems to be a error". I'm sick of this. Also Amazon use to give you updates on your deliveries but that feature seems to be a hit or miss now. Sometimes you don't know when the estimated delivery time is to track your order. Amazon please fix this!! Not acceptable!!

Good selection. Issues with shipping. My main gripe is selecting a secure location have my packages delivered. I never want it at my doorstep because I am usually away from home and packages have been stolen before. I usually have it set to the drop box but at times it will switch back to my main address either prior to making an order or like today where an order was switched to my actual address. I understand if the item is too big to fit in the box but I really wish they didnt swap locations

Please get rid of the new video autoplay feature! Whoever thought is was a good idea, what were you smoking? I want some of that! 😁 Tracking map is RIDICULOUSLY tiny! Why not expand it to the whole screen? It's not like you can't - you do it for Fresh, why not do the same for all deliveries? Also, sorting by price stopped working recently. Pretty frustrating.

I live in Australia and have the app set as such. FREQUENTLY when I click on a link in discord, YouTube, websites etc etc it's to the US store. Rather than just show me the item... The app prompts me to change country. Every. Single. Time. I shouldn't need to change the country in the app just to view an item in another country, by all means flag it on the screen or in the items page or something... But don't force me to change the country for the whole damned app!

App is trash, use a PC if you can. I've never been able to open links sent through text without jumping through hoops as to not just end up on the home page. The apps back buttons while in the cart are in the same areas as the place order button so when the app lags you'll place the order. Endless scrolling just to get to the reviews section.. just a lot of bad. App needs some new brains.

Not Great. I liked Amazon at first but now they have multiple items listed for WAY over actual value, the filters don't work well at all and in my household alone there have been SIX packages gone "missing," in the last 30 days. It's insane. I can't believe that many items could go missing like that, I am starting to lose all faith/interest in Amazon.

I wish it would tell the subtotal in each "Your List" I have to add them to my cart just to find the price then add them back to my list. Also, it would be great if you could add the option "Add to list" to the right of all the items that you search for instead of clicking on a certain item from your search and scrolling down to find "Add to list" Overall, awesome!!!

Good app. I don't like how this app is constantly running in the background, it drains my battery!!! I even have it set on my phone not to run in the background & it still runs in the background. Another bummer that I found for this app, is that I can't uninstall it because it came pre-installed on my phone. So I had to disabled it, even though I still would like to use it every now & again! It's frustrating!!! That's why I rated this app 2 stars!!!

The app is way too sensitive to taps. Half the time when I'm just trying to scroll it'll mistake a swipe for a tap and take me to a page I never wanted to view. Also constantly creeped out by the "shopping livestreams" section and wish I could turn it off, or at least not have it autoplay. Some of us are on limited data plans, don't waste it on video streams without my permission.

First of all I don't like ' apps. That put words into your mouth and then expect you to choose one of the incorrect one? Actually I have two items that I would like to gripe about although in the past Amazon won't answer and probably throws these into the trash. I hope you are listening!! I bought a 18 piece small flashlight set which included 18 mini lights and complete set of AAA batteries. I did not repeat did not get the batteries! . SEND ME BATTERIES;!!!!!!!...NOT MORE..FLASHLIGHTS?

The standards have really slipped lately. Now half of the results are sponsored and not as relevant, and not as trustworthy either, and the customer service used to be one of the highlights. The staff are still great but the app is so buggy it's unbelievable they don't invest in getting it right before sending out an update. The callback doesn't work, the chat option is difficult because the keyboard obscures the chat box which doesn't move up above they keyboard, simple, basic coding. Shame.

This app is great. It was great. I say was because for the last month it has been spazzing out. Every once in a while, turning pitch black pr stark white, sometimes multi colored lines streak the pages, and a product im trying to look at dissapears and reappears like im playing freaking peek a boo with it. I have to close it quite a few times while usig the app to get it to work properly, and its really annoying because it takes forever getting back to what i was looking at.

Lists and downloads are a hassle! I use the app more than via my PC, and use it frequently throughout the day. As others have stated, Lists have become a pain in the neck over the past several months, if not longer. They frequently freeze, then bounce up and down as you try to get further down. And, I believe since the last update, suddenly I'm unable to download digital content for my Kindle! That's a BIG DEAL! Is that Amazon or Google causing this? Whichever, FIX IT! Play nice together.

I love using Amazon for Prime and other things but give me a break go and order some actually well designed app, because the one you have right now looks like it was partaking in middle school design contest, it uncomfortable, hard to read, everything is a messy, there's nothing about intuition. Searching for anything is a hassle, while searching for something you can get results of a totally different products, make categories, advanced search filters. Even consumer profile isn't intuitive....

Amazon isn't what it used to be. The last 5 items I've ordered has either arrived wrong or never shipped at all (there was months between orders) when calling customer service, it always turned into a nightmare of misunderstanding, due to them not speaking English, or outright lies. Save yourself the trouble and shop on ebay. Or anywhere else. Prices are similar and at least ebay cracks down on the B.S when it's needed. (BTW, my last order was a book. Amazon is KNOWN for books and still failed)

Just downloaded the update after delaying as long as possible and, of course, the update is terrible. The account and menu pages don't load, images don't load when you want to expand them. If you just want to search something you know you want and buy it, use it. If you want to manage your account, you'll have to go through a browser. Uninstalled, it's just not worth the headache and data exposure.

Every other (always the first time) I open the app. It won't pass the "you can't join prime on the app" page, so I always have to reopen it. Also, unless the internet is perfect. It takes forever to load. The filters are too simple and too few. You can't choose your own price range, only something like £1-£25, £25-£50 (but not both (why?)). Also, changing the order will not work (or I'm too impatient to wait) unless signal is perfect. Edit:You can now swipe/click back button to bypass problem.

Since the new update, I'm asked repeatedly in a small time frame to verify that I'm not a bot. Then completely glitches even after I verify. Viewing/tapping anything n editing Wishlists leads to the same "Something Went Wrong On Our End" message for the next 15-30 minutes. App is now impossible to use. Constant error messages when saving to a wishlist, glitchy misclicks (clicks items on even on screen) and very slow response when tapping Add to List. Will be uninstalling until further notice.

Edit 2022: i used to get shipping/delivery notifications (which i want). Now i also get ads (which i don't want). Looks like you can either turn on notifications which gives you both kind, or turn off and lose the important notifications about deliveries. That sucks. Edit 2020: Strange. Searching in the Amazon app now has the Previous and Next buttons instead of continuous scrolling. Looks like we stepped 3 years back in time?

Extremely frustrating. It lags and it is absolutely terribly slow. When you go to heart something you're not provided an option for which list you would like that item to be put into so you have to then go in and manually move everything, but it takes FOREVER to do so. The least you could do is offer a mass selection. This has been going on for a very long time, as in years and I figured maybe they'll fix it but you guys never have. I've tried everything to fix it and nothing works. So over it.

The new app's a downgrade. Checking orders for shipping updates is MUCH slower. Before: Tap menu icon, tap on orders, done. Now: Tap on menu-like icon, wait 3-4 seconds for it to load, tap on orders, wait 1-2 seconds. Also, when cleaning up subscribe & save items, I ended up having to hit the back arrow a dozen+ times to get back to the menu page. You can't tap on the icon to get back to it. I find the new app icon a bit creepy too. What was wrong with the old one?

The latest update puts advertisements that play for several seconds when opening the app for stupid Amazon shows I will never watch. Then, I can't open my shopping cart... every time I try to go to my cart to check out, it goes to my previous search results page instead. I'm so frustrated with the app experience because it just shows how Amazon is behaving as a business, faulty app updates that ruin customer experience just for the sake of ad revenue. I might cancel my entire Prime subscription.

If Amazon changed the developers for this last update 😭, please switch back. The app is not functioning properly. I barely got to checkout & I searched for "x" then remembered I needed to remove something from my cart and it kept bringing me back to the search page. when I searched for "y" it still gave me the "x" search. Please make the Amazon app functional again. Amazon has always been a love of mine. However, in the midst of hurricane Ian when I needed ease it only frustrated me.

There are a few things I'd change. The "this or that" button placement is no good. I keep making a selection without meaning to while I'm scrolling down to view it. I notice that the preferred option is always the option on the right, may be an issue im not alone in experiencing. Some of the aspects of the Amazon account can only be managed from a desktop/laptop web browser still.... its 2022... Many of the features used to manage the account still feel hidden away in the app.

Used to be an app for shopping. Still is but not with these new annoyance "features". Why am I being spammed with watch live sports? I spent over an hour trying to disable these app notifications. I've contacted support and their answer was "you can't". Even if you disable ALL notifications in app, you will still get those push notifications. You can't change these setting on the website either. Seriously Amazon? Terrible design, and customer support.

It's hard to find exactly what you're looking for and sometimes it excludes results for some reason. Heaven forbid you try and move something from one list to another or delete something off a list. Everytime I try the app immediately stalls and quits working within a few minutes. I never get more than 7 things deleted at a time. The only good thing about it is I've never had issues with orders. They arrive within the projected time. Website works well, app is extremely buggy.

what a search engine coming from one of the biggest tech companies on the planet. if you use filter by price it will flood you with irrelevant results so you go back to the default "featured" = only what Amazon wants to show you. same searches between app and computer browser yield different results, restricts browsing diverse selection.

Delayed as long as possible before updating to this piece of garbage. New version sucks. It loads very slow. It does not have next page when browsing but instead has a stupid "try again" on the bottom, and it loads previous page over and over instead of giving you other product to look at or compare to. It works well on tablet but not my phone. It sometimes make my phone run hot too. Amazon do take this piece of crop back and give us back the previous version or give option to revert back.

The app decided to change the language to French and no matter how many times I switch it back to English, it'd be back to French. Even when I manage to change the language setting, the headings are still in French. By the time I open the app again, the setting is back to French. I've never used French on my phone. Since I don't understand the language, it's super inconvenient to the point I can't use the app anymore. It's been 3 months now. Please fix the issue!

So the filter options are confusing and don't give you the options you want. Used to have a filter price high to low but can't find it anywhere. The way they bill and display orders is for their convenience not the customers. If I buy 100$ worth of stuff i don't want to see it as 10 separate purchases. Just show me the 1 order I placed and within the order show the 10 items not 10 separate charges and orders.

Amazon WAS good for a couple years, mostly with their fast free shipping and stuff BUT Amazon is slipping, hard and fast (that's what she said). Next day delivery has not worked for me that last 5 times, I am a prime member, it ends up being late then later then later until I cancel it, reorder, & it fixs it. If they lose a package in transit they should just fix it for u instead of telling u later and later. EBAY IS WAYYYYY BETTER AND CHEAPER AND $ BACK GUARANTEE! Not once had an ebay problem.

Quick shopping, right at your finger tips! I love Amazon! Fast shipping, great variety, available anytime. App does well & doesn't crash. Can we please get a dark mode setting to ease the light on our eyes from the screen? Also, can a higher version of the app be designed? I have a phone with a smaller RAM & limited storage space so it would be super helpful!

I decided I would add a backup item to one of my subscribe and save orders. There was absolutely no warning that doing so would actually change the terms of my subscription. When I saved the backup item, it changed my savings on the item from 20% to 15%. Had there been any indication simply adding a backup item would change my subscription, I never would have done it. There was no resolution from customer service.

This app still doesn't work properly. I had problems using it on an older tablet. Bought a new tablet recently and still have issues. Pop up windows don't function properly. All I see is a copy of the screen behind the window, inside the window. Doesn't help me trying to see a product "in use" before purchase. Curious why other Amazon apps work without issues, but this one does not?

Good app and good service. I do have one issue and I can't be the only one. Under the Android settings in developer options, there's an option for "Force Dark Mode" under Hardware Accelerated Rendering. This works well with the app except when searching. The text is white and so is the text box, so it's impossible to see what you're typing. I feel like this could easily be fixed.

The ui isn't as clean as it could be. The search settings in app are completely different from the website. If you try to search on website it shows you relevant items whereas in app it sometimes shows something close other times not so much but never as well as the website. The app can be slow loading at times. And while browsing there's the issue when scrolling down and a video comes up instead of continuing it stops and pulls up the video. Should be a way to disable videos for prime members.

Have used this for years & appreciate it. However, recently noticed that I cannot change language from French to English successfully. It keeps reverting to French or shows some of both. Although I speak both, it is frustrating, and no doubt so for anyone speaking English primarily. Very disappointing to see this in such a large & prosperous company.

For two days in a row I'm unable to pick up my packages at the Amazon locker. There isn't a way I can find to contact technical support about their bug! The help doesn't have a radio button for my situation. I just tried to use the app to write a review. I switched to a different app when I was almost done, to look up something on the web, and when I returned my review was wiped clean! Only the first number of stars was still registered.

Have used Amazon Prime for over 10years and has always been a very beneficial app with prime shipping, music, video, and audible all included. However recently in the event that there is an issue that needs to be resolved through customer service the process has never been more frustrating and confusing. I have emailed twice now about why my account is unable to submit reviews or review videos as I was wanting to leave a beneficial detailed review on a recently purchased product and no response.

This app used to run flawlessly and with speed, but for the past month or so, it's extremely slow, constantly halts between actions, images take forever to load and then they load blurry and freezes for like 10 seconds before the images become clear and you can scroll between images. They need to fix this app! I'm on hear multiple times a day and purchase from them several times a week and this slowness and freezing is HORRIBLE! And it's not my internet connection nor my phone!

App now shows an add on every start up, even if you pay for prime, and most prime items still aren't 2 day shipping. The search still isn't very good (often get partial matches well before the full search match you are looking for, items out of price order due to scam, used, or other size options, and numerous other problems,) and the reviews are often obvious fakes or sometimes for a different product.

While it has its uses, I find it exceedingly both stupid and annoying that when trying to log into the official website, the app automatically opens. If I wanna open the app then I'll click on the damn app. I also find it annoying that I need the app to share links from the website with other people who have the app other wise it just opens the app but does not take them to the product I'm sharing with them. Major fail. Fix you're bugs!

The app has become increasingly annoying because of the ridiculous "BUY MORE!!" features. Not only does it intrusively suggest Users Also Bought popups as soon as I select something, it has also started sending asinine promos in my notifications bar. Amazon, I REALLY DGAF if there's a game, show, etc. I'm on the verge of using your competitors. Please give users the option to opt out of all these extra features. I want to be notified when a package arrives. NOTHING ELSE!!

The latest update will not pull up search results by scanning bar codes. Rendering the app useless unless we want to stand there typing in search terms and then scrolling to find the product. I can type into Chrome just as easy and find listing a variety of sites. They added Shop the Look which is useless for us that don't shop for clothes.

Easy to use. I do wish Amazon would have the identical item in price order, for review, other than throwing in items that I didn't search for. I could go in 5-10 pages, find the item I'm looking for, after irrelevant items were listed. Now. THAT'S annoying. Otherwise, I LOVE the quick shipping, excellent-quality items. I do, though, also wish Amazon's prices were more competitive with eBay, and not so much more expensive.

App constantly buffering. Not just once in awhile when a lot of people may be using it, but every time I use it. I can NEVER check my orders cause that page will never load. Other setting options take forever to load as well. The only part that seems to work is the shopping portion of the app. Will take my money but won't let me check on my order.

Overall: Love this app! I change my review/lower stars in hopes developers will fix glitches. Glitches: Filter options not working. Nothing shows up as selected/highlighted either in the filter field or results bar. Result #s always stay the same;Can't tell if results narrowed down. Also the prime "switch" on the top left of the results page is not working. I tap on it, slide it, etc. Nothing. Just stays over to the left so I can not filter out non-prime items. This started yesterday 08/09/22.

Every few months they change the layout. I never really see an improvement. The only thing I notice that is really different is I need to relearn how to use it. Now there is a floating alexa button that I can't turn off. Search function is horrible. I can't do any advanced searches. Sometimes I am lucky if more than 20% of the results are relevant.

Advertisements are starting to become extremely intrusive. When LOTR tv show came out, an Amazon advertisement would overlay on top of the screen and made you wait several seconds before allowing you to access the app. Today, 9/14/22, they sent me a push notification to advertise a football game to stream. There isnt any way to disable this without disabling the useful "your package is 10 stops away" notifications. Dystopian. We are getting closer to that black mirror episode every day.

I've the used for years and never had a problem. Had to chat with customer service today, using the app, and the keyboard covers up what is being typed, so if I wanted to check my spelling, I had to close the keyboard and then reopen to resume. Why it doesn't work like other messaging apps, where the screen gets bumped up so you can see what you're typing, is beyond me. Otherwise I would give it 5 stars.

Crashes a lot and I'm starting to lose patience for it. I've been using Amazon for a long time but in recent years it just keeps crashing whenever I try to do something other than purchase or browse. I keep trying to edit my wish lists but I can only move/delete/edit 1 or 2 items before it crashes and I have reopen the app and go all the way back into my lisits to the item I was editing. I've put up with it for a few years now but I'm really starting to lose my patience. Please fix this.

Used to be good but now almost unusable. My shopping cart, lists etc which used to always be on a tool bar at the bottom are no longer there and cannot be directly accessed. What good is a shopping app if your cart is hidden??? Or you grant locate your shopping lists??? An app like this doesn't need constant updates... Just needs to be functional!

BEWARE!! Amazon is the WORST online shopping experience of my life! Account was put on hold and trying to fix it was unbelievably stressful and difficult. You can't just call and fix it, they want you to send pictures of your debit card, ID, a pdf of your bank statements along with other things and it's just ridiculous. I'm not sending all of that info out into the internet to a stranger. There's no other way to fix it so I uninstalled app and won't use again. ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE!

They changed the Amazon Prime app so you can't buy/rent movies there anymore. That alone was annoying. Then you go to the regular Amazon app to do it and all they have is a picture of the movie/TV show, the rental and purchase prices but no way to buy them. I pressed the picture thinking that was the solution but all it did was take me to another screen that shows details such as the director, cast etc. But still no way to buy or rent anything. Very annoyed.

I like Amazon but the app is really starting to be irritating. Lately I've tried to checkout and it starts to go to the checkout page but then it stops and goes right back to my cart. I've tried un-instaling and restart device then re-installing then restart device again, ive tried removing items from cart and restart device, tried logging out even. Still doing it, tried to speak to customer service and the person I got was incredibly rude!
