Customer service is trash, Amazon logistics system to change delivery address of my package seems to not be useful. Customer service cant help with my request, because the carrier ( amazon logistics ) has already picked it up but cant seem to get in contact with them to stop the delivery in itself, or a supervisor. Also the update to app is terrible and confusing. Leave it the way it used to be.

I've had this app for years and have always been super happy. Totally user friendly. However, lately it keeps changing to Spanish. This has happened with my while family and friends. I contacted support via email but they never got back to me. I have Uninstalled and reinstalled the app several times but it won't stay in English.

update: liking the app more BUT can you guys please create a multi selection option for our "saved for later" items so we can move to certain "Lists" quicker? That'd be amazing. Also, please remove having to click the button "load more" when swiping down our saved for later items. I preferred when it just loaded automatically. now it takes longer to organize. I have 600 items saved 😆

This app used to run flawlessly, I don't know what they did with the last update but the app is running like absolute trash now. Some parts of the app work, but then some of the most crucial Parts don't. For example I can check my gift card balance and other important information on my account, but I can't look at my orders at all in the app. Each time it just says "Uh oh something went wrong on our end" try again and its the same results. Yet, when I go to Amazon on Chrome it works fine 4/21/22

Can't contact CS agents unless you download the app. It's ridiculous. They make it incredibly hard to contact anyone so you only do the set computerized options. Also absolutely despise how they ship and process orders. They'll ship your items individually and charge after each one ships instead of just charging once - you know when you make the order. Not even an option to select "only send one package i understand the wait might be longer"

Items said order within 4 hours and receive it in two days. I wait 30 minutes to place the order and it changes to 6 day delivery. So I thought maybe the item was just out of stock or something. Nope. Every single item on all of Amazon was 6 days or more delivery! Thats Amazon prime and sold and shipped through Amazon. Customer service was a joke. The first one said it was a technical error and fixed it. As soon as the chat ended it went back to 6 day shipping. Error was never fixed.

This used to be a five star app but recently they've started issuing advertisements in push notifications, and that's frankly not acceptable no matter what app it is. I'd have given four stars if they used Android's built in system for disabling specific types of notifications, but they didn't, so now I have to turn off both the unwanted ads and helpful notifications at the same time.

1 Step For ward, 2 Steps Back in my opinion. Previous version of the app worked absolutely fine, the one thing it was missing was the ability to filter results by price. That's now been added in, but now the user interface is just an absolute minefield. Used to get you straight to the info you wanted in 1 click, now it's going to a page, scrolling, going into a sub menu etc. Notifications also now don't work - previously I'd get continuous tracking updates, now it rarely even tells me anything.

The app is not great. When you click on "subscribe and save" it doesnt show you the products that you have subscribed to save, it just advertises products. Also there is no option to contact a seller after buying or returning an item. You can review a seller but not contact them. Also constant emails are very annoying. Every thing I order equals a new email I have to receive. There should be an option to turn off emails for orders and shipping information. This needs updating

App freezing, crashing, lagging, you name it, it's f****d. Never had any problems until they switched to this green bs for the Holidays or whatever tf they've changed it for. It used to be easy to make purchases, edit them if need be, etc. I have been trying for days to make a purchase and am getting a "Payment revision needed" promt. There is nothing wrong with my card, I've used it at other places this whole time without issue. They have made it playing hell trying to use their business.

I have a love hate relationship with this app and Amazon in general. The convenience is definitely nice and there are features I really like, but it is like the wild west when trying to find legit and decent priced items. I get the run around a lot when trying to solve issues too and that's super frustrating. I didn't get a refund back on an item that was damaged in transit and returned to Amazon. I tried to resolve the issue and just got the run around by the automated helper. So annoying.

I cannot understand how this app has a 4.5 rating. They have to be false reviews, because the app has almost become completely unusable. It won't load searches. Constantly saying Oops.. . We hit a snag and tries to send me back to the home page. Items with multiple choices to purchase do not load when you choose a different one. I have to jump through hoops just to be able to search for my most recent purchases. I don't even know why I'm still using this app. It's absolutely horrible.

The items in my cart just disappeared which is extremely frustrating adding what I want to buy and going to purchase the items and them not being there. The items didnt even go back to saved items they are just gone. And searching through my saved for later takes so much longer now that I can't scroll through the lost and instead have to tap, "load more." It's highly annoying.

Shopping is easy now using this app. It is nice being able to get groceries with out having to be stressed out having to go to the store. I used to work at a grocery store and I dreaded having to shop after working as a cashier. The only issue is having the driver not pay attention to drop off instructions. I have had bags put out in the rain in the past. Ruining grocery items. Amazon customer service always does the best to fix any issues with the driver.

Incredibly Slow loading when purchase options are shown. When I need to change either a size, or color selection... It's ridiculous. Literally can take minutes to alter the selection. And when I click the photo to see the images closer, that's another 20 seconds. Zooming in SOMETIMES works. Overall it's a good app, but this aspect makes me not even be able to select the size options I need. Please fix it. It's not a problem with my phone considering it's one of the latest Androids. Thank you

I love Amazon and the app can be somewhat useful. The ways to narrow down options of what u want could be better though. For ex: if you're looking for a certain price on items it would be nice to be able to put it in manually from how low to high of a price range instead of up to $25 and then $25 to $50. What if I need something up to $60?Also, when I pick the option to show items from lowest to highest I notice a significant difference in the # of items found.

This app just gets worse and worse. They make necessary things like returns and customer service info impossible to find quickly. You can longer cancel certain subscriptions through the app, you have to call customer service, the regular "orders" screen no longer loads at all. Things are getting messy when searching for products... Overall it's probably not even worth two stars, but I'll give it a freebie just because I use it instead of the internet on a computer most of the time.

Overall, I like the Amazon app for shopping. It's easy to use although some of the suppliers are hit & miss on following through. There is one major flaw and I'm sick of it. I go to rent a video and can't. The app says I can but there is no way to do so. Feels like major click bait to me and I'm not buying DVDs. They're a huge waste of money and plastic.

Since one of the recent updates I can no longer view the entire page on my screen. I can't even move it around to see the rest and I can't access the 'next page' button. I do all my shopping by phone so this is a real problem. Seriously, I am going more and more to other sites because of these problems. Hate that I am forced to watch a commercial when opening the app. Not cool. Uninstalling app now.

Slowwwwww I've used Amazon and the app for years. This past year the quality of both has greatly declined. 1)the app is really slow now. Takes forever to load and it will glitch & freeze. Homescreen is inconvenient& you are sent back to it too often. 2)deliveries aren't bundled together even if requested for a later date and mine are often left at the wrong address even though my address is easy to locate and reach. I hope they improve, but it's not looking good.

This app is only good for tracking shipments. Browsing Amazon is so much easier on an actual browser with tabs. On devices with larger screens (ZFold 4) the experience is horrible, the app is not able to take advantage of screen real estate, just blowing up the UI in size instead of allowing you to see more info. Lack of tabbed browsing, and poor usage of higher screen resolution make this app very unuseful for shopping.

Edit: The new filters are terrible. "Order by" is in between all the other filters and hard to find. Edit: Everything I add to my cart is by default a periodic order. The default should be single order. Thank you for not selling our data.I think Amazon is the only app that doesn't share my shopping preferences with third parties.I sometimes search for very specific items on Amazon extensively and I have never gotten any suggestions for similar products outside of the site.

Amazon is my go to site for shopping. However, I can no longer use the app as ever since an update from a while back the app has disabled itself. When I try to enable the Amazon app on the Google Play store, it doesn't allow me to. It will enable for a quick second and disable itself again. I haven't seen many have the same problem. Maybe it's not the app causing the problem? I wish someone could help me on this.

Not sure why they ever felt the need to make it more difficult to search through past orders. Even more fun when an order you placed through Amazon literally doesn't exist in your purchase history anymore too. Wild! I haven't updated the app in a while, but clearly their most recent update is trash so I'll keep avoiding their updates!

The app crashes all the time. Even when I'm just trying to view a product or view more images of it, the app only shows those error screen with dogs and that's it... You can't do anything about it. FYI I've tried cleaning up the storage from the android's app menu and now I can't log in to my account! A total mess of an app.

The app has worked fine for some time, and all of a sudden today it won't let me log in, I can't search my order history, nothing seems to be working. I tried clearing the app data and cache, tried uninstall and reinstalling, the app is just flat out refusing to work and gives me an error about my internet connection, even though I can access my Amazon account on my phone web browser just fine. What happened Amazon?

App keeps switching to Spanish. Even when I changed it in the settings literally two minutes ago. Doesn't show me my recent orders. And accessing the settings to fix the weird language switch is a nightmare. I had to Google a link to be redirected instead of using my profile settings. And like I said, itsl still switching to Spanish. The service itself is solid. I get refunds or replacements if a parcel fails to arrive. But damn do I hate this app. Especially now.

Do not save your card on app!!!! Every single time I make a purchase it wants me to save the card and occasionally I forget to remove it. When I forget the card on app suddenly I start getting fake Amazon account messages and it wasn't until yesterday that I got a "digital charge" for $5 on my card. When I check my digital and even regular orders there's nothing to show for it. SCAMMERS PARADISE!!! Customer service claims it's not them and refuse to help.

Terribly wasteful with data usage, and the app has distracting autoplay videos that can't be disabled. (Even *Facebook* recognizes this is an accessibility problem.) It performs some basic tasks, but Amazon has confused "Shopping" with "intrusive billboard". The in-app navigation is also a catastrophe: "Back" doesn't remember where you were, so every page change means scrolling through several screens. No tabs. Advertised real-time tracking doesn't actually exist.

It was ok but this recent update ruined the experience. The app always used excessive data but now it is terrible. Somehow browsing for 10 minutes uses more data than watching a 10+ minute video on YouTube. Since this update the app is extremely laggy and even heats my phone up which it never did. Not only that but sometimes pages don't even load or when they eventually do they are missing half the stuff requiring me to go to the previous page and try again. There's plenty more wrong.....

Just from how Amazon treats its workers, I am going to cancel the whole service from my life. About the app: it's trash. Literally. At every single update it gets slower and more confusing. It's absurd that it doesn't have a more efficient way to organize lists. When shopping you have to go through a lot of low quality products that are incredibly over priced or striaght up scams. If Amazon ever had any kind of reliability, now it has lost it in my eyes. Never again.

Amazon is faithful. Through the pandemic this was sometimes the fastest and easiest (and even the only way) to get essential and nonessential items. I have had great experiences on rare occasions when it was necessary to call customer service. I love the vast product selection, the ability to ship to multiple addresses, shipping speed, and my Amazon Wallet!

In order to use the app, you are forced to view a full screen ad which you can't close. I know it's a shopping app but the ads were already ridiculous. I've turned off all notifications to keep the ads away, but now every time I open the app, it's a full page ad, that you can't escape, shown for a moment before you are allowed to use the app.

I like the app, I like that it can link up with Google Assistant so that I can use Google Assistant to search the app. however, there's an annoying bug where I click on a page it loads and then just shows me a picture of a dog and says that the page that had loaded couldn't be loaded and I have to start over. This only seems to be an issue on the Android app because some of my friends on iPhone don't seem to have this problem.

I love shopping on Amazon! But a word of caution, because it is highly addictive!😁 I would have given 5 stars, but sometimes I run into a problem, that annoys the heck out of me. That is, sometimes the descriptions of a product are not always true. Especially when the description says Large. Otherwise, I Love everything Amazon...Prime, Fresh, just everything that my membership has to offer!

The search engine kills the experience. It is very difficult to find the item being searched for. Often times, there are too many listings for a certain item that appears to be the exact same thing with slightly different wording and different prices. I have copied key words from titles of items and searched for them and still, the listing I copied is buried in the results. I might find it by clicking something related and then look through the window of related items I might actually find it.

Rated 1 star because amazon chooses to use the worst couriers they can find. My area has one called dragonfly shipping. They are the most useless around. They dont follow instructions, they dont knock and leave packages in clear street view. I've given feedback to the courier and directly to amazon, with no change. This must be part of amazons master plan for me to use their pick up locations instead of couriers. Seems to be my only option for security, but is so inconvenient.

I'm not sure why, but the app is always randomly switching language settings from English to French. I was able to go into the settings to switch it back to English up until the latest update version. Somehow the layout of all the options in the app has changed and I can no longer find where to change the language settings. I can deal with navigating in French, but it's just weird that the language randomly switches to begin with, and also weird that it can no longer be changed back.

Used to be great, but lately, I've had multiple issues with Amazon as a whole. Lost packages that disappear from my order history. Packages marked as delivered when they were not. Orders being canceled the day of delivery. And now, the app itself is a problem. Can't see my order history or track packages. The screen just glitches and ends in an error code. I guess going to space with celebs is more important than taking care of the people who got you there.

I don't know what they did in this update, but the app is terrible now. It's almost unusable - it kept saying they were experiencing errors when I tried to place an order after this last update. It took several tries. Now, when I try to check on the status of an order, it gives the "Oops, something went wrong with this page," error. It's been several days. I hope someone is aware and fixing this...I've been a Prime customer for almost a decade and have never had so many problems.

Great app, I use it often. But it keeps defaulting to Spanish, and then I have to navigate an app in a language I don't speak to switch it back to English. I find out when I'm emailed about my order in Spanish. My app settings and phone settings are both set to the United States region, I don't use a VPN. The website never changes, it's always in English. This is strictly an app issue. So this is worth losing a star for me.

Slow at the best of times, crashes when it wants to be more annoying. One would be safe to assume that the most current interation of a product would be, at the very least, an upgrade of the previous few product it was replacing but do not expect that from this app as of June 1, 2022. Preferably, it would be the best out of the entire line, but that would be asking too much. Heck, I would even take something developed by a teen "dark web hacker" over whatever this thing is. Thank you Amazon.

Amazon used to be amazing but in recent years the service has become horrible. This will be my last year with Prime as the only reason I had it was quick delivery times and even under recent events the estimated delivery time used to be accurate even if slower then normal but that is expected. In one order 1 item arrived on time 1 item is lost with a refund and the last item they keep pushing my delivery so that I cant ask for a refund. As the "item" is on the way its a nightmare to get customer support and they wont do anything till it is "lost".

I never leave reviews on anything, but this needs it. Their customer service is extremely hard to find, and when you do find it, it can take some time to get to an associate instead of the robot. Amazon charged me over $100 extra in the span of a month, but that's more about the company than the app itself. They also sometimes try to slip Prime into your checkout, so make sure you remove it if you don't want it.

Why can't I buy albums from the app anymore? If you're gonna force me into the music app, at least let me sample/buy from it... the music app sucks and just starts a "radio" station. Now I gotta use work-arounds, and I still end up with 5 extra steps to buy new albums. Also, downloading music to my phone puts it in some phantom folder in my phone, unable to be accessed by any other app I like to use. I bought the music, let me use it.

Probably one of the worst ways to shop on Amazon. Not sure how the other OS handle this app, but overall it's terrible to use on Android. It constantly crashes, images and pages frequently don't load, and the customer service pages boots you in circles if prompts are inputted in a certain order. It's terrible overall as a user to have to constantly close and reopen the app. If this is a multi-billion $ company, I would expect a whole lot more out of a UI and basic load speeds.

Placed an order that never came. Received an email stating it had been returned. Went to reorder the item; I put the item in the cart & it read 'get a $15 coupon if you order this through the app'. I click the button to get the app. The app downloads. There is no coupon. I go back to the email that lead me to the coupon & click again; it reads 'you've already received this coupon '. IVE RECEIVED NOTHING. So beyond frustrated with this whole ordeal.

App gets very slow. Sometimes I have to close the app when it freezes which then makes me lose all my progress, unless I've put it in my cart. They also have counterfeit products, so I never know if I'm getting the real deal or not until it arrives. There's a lot of fake reviews trying to scale the product up or down, so it's hard to know if it's a good product or not. All this to say, I'd say it's still worth having to use once in a while just check other places first for a product.

App is not working properly. Its been doing this for quite some time now. Where if I would make a purchase Order and my notifications alert me. The app wont load properly or let me click on anything. It stays on a blank loading page. For minutes on end. I deleted the app , refreshed the app , the phone itself and etc. It just keeps doing the same thing. It won't let me check what was delivered and the order purchase made section.

After the changes to their application for Android smartphones, I hardly use the computer to find and order what I need. The search features are great, even for older users like myself. And anytime your not sure, the assistant can help you do almost anything. Even getting a return processed, or looking for a missing order, it's all quick and easy.

9/21/22 update. It STILL won't load order screen. I'm ready to not use this app anymore. It's THAT ANNOYING. Won't load orders screen. Ever. For about a month now I haven't been able to look at my orders. I can log into my email and see if they've been shipped but the app won't let me see them. It just tries to load and starts again, etc etc. Please fix it.

Used to be a great service. Now the price keeps going up and service continues to decline. Delivery windows are increasingly incorrect. My orders continue to be delivered to the incorrect address. What happened to the decent service? No delivery notifications, no pictures of where it was delivered. You have to comb through tons and tons of reviews just to make sure what your purchasing is accurate and not some p.o.s. , which it usually is anyways. The app almost never works correctly either.

Used to be great. Not now. Filter no longer working. Prime button not working. Search gives a bunch of products that have nothing to do with the product I am searching for. Can no longer add products to my wish lists. What a mess. Have started shopping elsewhere in individual stores for products I need. Prices have skyrocketed and most products are made in China so they are cheaply made and returns are nearly impossible to do. Amazon used to be a great way to shop. Not any more.

Since January 1st, 2022, the app won't load properly. It cites an issue with connection but there are zero problems with my wifi. I can access the website without any issues on my laptop. With the app, it half loads the page or not at all. I've been using it for about a year or so just fine. All of a sudden, it's practically impossible. I'm on an Android phone.

Had a subscription to prime which was a good deal in a trial run I canceled a week and a half before the final canceled date for 2 years they continued to take money out of my account never paid it back never got it back after being told that it was definitely canceled by their email they continued to take money out of my account until I found out about it I didn't miss it because I have a small budget that I live on and mostly everything is budgeted to the t. This is truth

It's difficult to filter and find exactly what you want, the ratings are screwed (bad reviews get marked out due to "Amazon Fulfillment"), deceptive titles, and all the manufacturers I've never heard of before. Free returns used to be a guarantee but now it's just a haste. Sadly I'm reverting back to in person shopping just to know what I'm buying is what I actually wanted.

I'd like to request that your Amazon drivers always take a picture of delivering from the porch. Also, they should enable back the tracking for actually where the van is. These are good features. I don't know why Amazon suddenly stopped it. Also, how can we reimburse for something that is lost and has not been delivered and you are asking us to return an undelivered item before you reimburse us?!. It's lost! How can we return it back? You should split lost option from the lost & damaged option.

Just... I don't really even have words to describe how indifferent this site has left me. I've had to cancel my Amazon Prime subscription SEVERAL times, and it seems that every few months, it magically renews itself. While PRIME has no problem figuring out which credit card to charge, Amazon can never seem to figure it out. I've had to delete the same card from my account FOUR times, and like prime, it magically reappears every couple of months. -1/10 for the site itself.

Latest update is a huge dissapointment! The app is incredibly slow to load, I haven't seen something so slow since Internet Explorer... In the previous version, the account dashboard was so easy to access, now it's like going through a maze to access anything... Trying to track your parcel to get an idea when it will be delivered? I think you've got better chances of catching 5G network on a flying plane. This "upgrade" was a total fail...

All of the sudden everything is SO TINY I can't read it. If I try to expand, it doesn't work. Customer service is no longer by phone; they hang up on you. Employees being paid in falling stock rather than cash. And yes, prices going up fast. Shipping is charged even when items are over $100, and not removed from order untill everything has been received weeks later.

AMAZON FIXED IT AND BROKE APP. For the last couple of years app worked great. They did an update for Android and half the time you cannot check order status via the app. You get a msessage "problem on our end go to home page" and some picture of some mutt. It's just the Android app. Works in Windows and IOS for iPad. It's an annoying Android problem that Amazon needs to be fix.

This has become a glitch ridden nightmare. The UI is all over the place and cluttered. When trying to remove items from wish-list will crash the app. Better off just using your browser.update. it's now lagging and stalling. Its impossible to swipe through items as it freezes. A bloated, unintuitive app, main menu button just above the back button🙄. Now I can't view my orders.

The app is buggy and Amazon does nothing to address the issues. I constantly have to force the app to stop, clear the cache, power down my phone, and then power it in again (not restart) if I want to view my orders. Otherwise I get nothing and my orders will not show up, or I maythe stupid dog picture with the "Oops" screen. This renders the app virtually useless because one has to check on one's orders since Amazon fails to deliver on time if even at all so frequently these days.

Just uninstalling. Bought a bed from them and delivery was awful. However delivery. Omplaibt window closed 2 mins after they sent email "how did we do". And after trying to find any method at all. Impossible to make a complaint. Just running round in circles. Final straw. Bought si much for them, and have prime. But done with them. Back to eBay. And local stores

The app is really bad lately, the order history keep disappearing and I have to reinstall the app to see it, everytime when you open the app you see adverts, first it was about the lord of the rings, now is prime access to sale or something, very irritating. There is no legal information if you click it it says: we can't find the page. Overall very bad experience lately.

Filtering and sorting don't appear to work anymore. It's hard to tell if this is a real bug, or part of how they are replacing search with sponsored results and advertising. I'm not sure why I even bother with Amazon anymore. It's not convenient, prices are inflated, prime items are more expensive and often fake or broken, search doesn't work, delivery is unreliable and slow. Usually its easier, faster, and better service to order direct or find a local physical shop.

Very slow to open, but otherwise pretty functional. I would expect a pretty immediate response from opening the app, but my lists, cart and menu area all take over 45 seconds just to bring up text, let alone images. Unacceptable, in this age of speed and convenience (admittedly first world problems, but Amazon should be big enough to fix this post haste.)

I've tried installing this for 3 months. It fails w/o error every time. I resorted to trying the Aurora store. That also failed, giving an error about insufficient memory space. Which is odd. I have 10gb free on the phone and another free 15gb on the SD card. I've tried clearing Playstore cache+data, & rolling back the play store updates. Even tried installing a 2021 version of the app from apkpure... Still failed. EVERYTHING else installs, Amz appstore, prime video, waze, netflix, etc HELP!

I have not been able to go to home inorder to get information on customer services, because my orders are not being delivered in a timely manner and sometimes not at all. I have never encountered such terrible delivery service and especially since you are paying for it through their Prime program. It is my worst nightmare since I can't get this delivery problem straight with Amazon going on 1 1/2 years now. I now do most of my shopping with Walmart never had a delivery problem with them.

Great app! Works really well, the only thing I would hope for it to have in the future is definitely dark mode! Whenever its night and I think of something I need to add to my cart it would help a lot if my eyes didn't burn. The only other complaint I have is the video playback on products, they are low quality and won't load half the time or stutter in the middle. Other than that just a few changes in the ui to make it look more modern would be appreciated.

The app is, more often than not, glitchy. I just had to reinstall it to try and get it to allow me to pick up an Amazon locker package because it would not get off the permissions screen, when I gave it Bluetooth permission about 100 times already. When I had a fraud issue with my account, it was close to impossible to find the right customer service number in the app, but it was easy to find on the actual website. The app sucks, and it sucks more that Amazon requires you to use it for lockers!

I've used Amazon for over a decade, and the app for nearly as long. It's been great until recently. What is with the ad loading screens now?? Now during promotional periods like Prime Day and Black Friday when you launch the app you have to sit through a dumb promotional loading screen. As if I couldn't figure out there were sales going on by looking at banner on the main screen. The loading screens don't make me want to shop the sales. In fact, they make me want to not open the app at all.

I used to shop a lot from Amazon. Sometimes more than 50 items per month. I had even subscribed to 30 items per month. The reason I was shopping for everything from them was that they offers me 12 month's warranty. But when some of the items stopped working before 12 months and I call for repair or refund I started getting a warning from amazon keep saying why you send back so many items. Even though I did explain for each item the reason but still they kept emailing me. So now I only..

Discouraged and galled. I used to be able to purchase an individual song and have it automatically added to Amazon music, but some content you've restricted to Music Unlimited only. All search results only exhibit Music Unlimited option, which is restrictive, hinders, and will ultimately make me lose interest in technology. You can't fly with no wings.

The Amazon App has suddenly stopped showing all previous orders and none of my wish lists show. I can see all this if I go through a web browser so I know it's not my account, it's an App problem. This happened suddenly whilst the app was open and I was doing a search. After looking around the App it turns out that my location had been switched to the USA even though I hadn't done that. Once I switched my country back to the UK, everything came back. Talk about a glitch.

Not a good exoerience thus far at all!! Signed up for a free trial, yet it wasn't free, I was charged $2. Was supposed to have a promo credit since I was not only charged for shipping even being a prime member, but taxed on that fee as well, but that never happened until I had to follow up and give all sorts of info they coulda got themselves, delivery didn't follow instructions on app or note in my window, sounded like he threw the package at door... And to top it all off.. wasn't even MY PKG!

An app from one of the biggest tech companies ever should not be this unstable. It's constantly timing out or failing to connect or throwing some random error that it doesn't explain. Also, the search / filter functionality is abysmal. Update: It's always crashing. You can't filter by custom price points. If it was some new start up it'd be mildly irritating but for Amazon....

Sends promotions via notifications even if you don't have Amazon Smile enabled, and they're in the same notification channel as everything else so you can't selectively disable them. Before I uninstalled it for that reason, it was miserably slow and unintuitive to use. Just use the mobile site instead, and then you can also use Amazon Smile without subjecting yourself to advertising push notifications.

Since the recent updates my orders NEVER load. I can't see them at all. The page shows that it's loading but it never loads. I updated again going it would fix the problem but still... Orders do not load at all. I have several family members who use the same app and are experiencing this same problem. PLEASE FIX THIS!! I have no idea what my order status is anymore so I will have to delete the app if this glitch is not repaired.

The sole purpose of the app was to make it easier to shop from my phone but since you can no longer use it to buy digital content, I have little use for it. Also, I used to be able to access my list of saved items from the home page. Not anymore! It takes a few more clicks and long loading times, which is frustrating. I will be shopping less from the site if it's so complicated and I have to use my computer every time. Disappointing.

The app is good. Somehow, Amazon sends to the wrong address sometimes. They have sent empty parcels (not fun to try to fix when there's nothing to return), not sent something because they wanted to raise the price without notifying me post-purchase, sent the wrong item on many occasions... but work with you if you can get through. Evil corporation, mediocore quality control, incredible convenience, and a good app.

Bad customer support, rarely accurate delivery times. I get items from Walmart and Best buy delivered faster to my house free of subscription costs than I do from prime with a fee. I favored prime heavy in the past but I am so tired of inaccurate 2 day delivery advertising which I expect to take 4, but now it's 7 days for items. They always say well it is 2 day shipping once we finally ship it, they don't mention they might take 5 it 10 other days for someone to prep 1 item, not peak season.

Horrible update to the app. Its not intuitive, nothing is organized in an orderly way, its difficult to find anything and now android can't purchase digital content just like ios. I want convenience when using the app, I want it easy to make a purchase, check on an order and quick to find things. THIS version is NOT that. This is not about not liking change. This is the change you've implemented being horrible. It does not make shopping on your site easier or enjoyable.

Dropped to 3 stars: when I choose to shop for a friend outside of the U.S, I choose their address for delivery, but too many items show up that say it is out of the delivery range. Very disappointing. When doing internationally, only companies that will ship to the selected address should show up in the search results. Creates a lot of wasted time. Is a major inconvenience for an app that is supposed to make things convenient.

I am sick of being bombarded by ads and there's no way to get rid of them. They are very annoying and I sometimes shop elsewhere because of that. As a Prime customer I should have the option get rid of ads, like how I can with YouTube Premium. From now on I will use eBay or go to a physical store unless there's something I want quickly which isn't available in physical stores

Browser experience is far better. Everything I tried to do is more difficult on the app. I don't get as good results when doing a search and there aren't nearly as many filters for sorting those results. If you want to sign out of the app so as to switch accounts there is absolutely no way to sign out of this app after you sign in. If this app is on your device the browser will always send you to the app so you cannot use another account. The Help menu applied to browser not the app.

2022 update means you can no longer rent or purchase music or films on the apps. You now have to go onto the website to do that. So not only do I need separate apps for each, I also need to go on to the website now too. It's ridiculous and frustrating. Amazon is already taking up so much of my phone, it's no longer feeling worth the hassle. Spotify, EBay and Netflix all combined are a lot less hassle than Amazon is becoming. The cons of Amazon are starting to outweigh the pros.

Forces you to use the app even though you can't buy digital content in the app anymore. Example: you can't buy ebooks in the app anymore. But if you try to search for an ebook in your browser, the app somehow takes over and forces itself open where there's no option to buy the book. I might be able to work with this if the browser search would execute simultaneously, but going back to the browser just leaves you on the homepage. Tap search and the app forces open again.... And again.

The recent updates have been steadily making the app worse and worse. The wishlist function is awful to use to the point it's almost useless. The filters now are an absolute joke - you cannot narrow it down nearly like it used to allow. Auto playing videos, completely irrelevant results abound. It feels like I'm on social media, not a shopping app.

The removal of purchasing downloadable content is bad enough, but then Amazon thinks we can replace it with the lists feature. Are you kidding me Amazon, your lists are straight out of 2002, they're clunky and difficult to manage. Fix those before you tell people that they are the only way to manage digital content from mobile. Or at least give me a way to easily grab a link so I can put it in my phone browser.

I have been using Amazon smile shopping app for years! It is simple to use and is my go to shopping app. There is room for improvement, however. One thing that frustrates me is that you cannot type services in the search Box , for example you cannot type in Amazon music, or subscriptions and pull up your lists. Navigating to personalized apps and subscriptions is a pain in the rear, If they fixed that 1 feature I would give it 5 stars!

Search function and filters do not work properly, often returning results that don't match what you're looking for, or if sorting by low to high price almost all results disappear. Did Amazon intentionally break the sort function so consumers can't find the best deal? No dark mode, really? No way to return/replace item if you already tossed the original packaging. Unable to contact a live person to discuss individual situations.

So I downloaded this once when the website wasn't working right, but it felt redundant, so I deleted it. Now, the website is getting glitchier and glitchier, so I download the app again in hopes of gaining some basic functionality. Buuuut the app refuses to open. Soooo, guess I'm not allowed to buy things on Amazon through any method other than blindly clicking "pay now" without checking any details? Cool. Fun. Great.

I see I'm not the only person frustrated at the sudden inability to add things to a specific list. You can hit the little heart icon, and it goes to your default list, but then you have to go through the multi-step process of moving it to another list. This is tedious and irritating, and a definite step backward. I also hate the new Google Play policy for digital content. Other than those two backwards changes, I still love the Amazon app and not having to spend time physically shopping.

Used to love this app.... But over the last few months it has gone down hill. The pages freeze on you as you brown through it and when you go to check your past orders it gets stuck in the rainbow loading screen and won't let you view it. Every once in a while it will pull up but 70 % of the time it doesn't. Very buggy. Please fix!

I'm having issues when I go to checkout and the total and or calculation is not right. I had to exit/close the App and then it ring's it up correct. But now I'm having issue with after sale: it's saying I need to add a different payment method yet it took All the money from my credit card, the exact amount leaving 70 cent's behind but the App ship one item from the that one big order and start complaining that there is a decline and I need to add another payment method. Buggy 🤔 App.

Please make language settings more sticky! Even though I use two languages and live in a bilingual country, I prefer to standardize interfaces across apps. For some reason Amazon's keeps switching languages. Looks like a documented bug. I don't understand why this app is trying to guess which language a user might want to see - let's have it set in the preferences and keep it that way until the user wants to switch.

Cannot check out. After being a loyal prolific customer for decades, I suddenly can't check out, using my normal delivery address and card, or any other. Customer services just tell me that the system is down or to uninstall/reinstall app, or to try different platforms. But none of those solutions work. They said tech support would call, but nothing yet. Days have gone by and no answer.

Terrible App (since they updated it). This used to be a great app. Amazon RUINED it. Sometimes it won't even scroll (just jitters up and down). Frequently you have to press buttons multiple times before they work. How they could update a perfectly good app into this garbage amazes me. I tried uninstall/reinstall - same trash. I finally Uninstalled and just went to their website - works great, fast, fluid, no lags, just like this app USED to be.

I hate that you can't buy kindle books or prime video from the main app anymore. It doesn't make sense, why are you trying to fill up our phones with multiple apps? It was convinent the way it was. If you wanted to buy in Kindle app sure that's great. But if you had just been trying to have an easier time searching for series, or decided that you didn't want paperback/hardback after all, and switched to Kindle, the OG app was great for that. And you buy video on your phone to watch on your TV.

The complete reload of the app based on location while I'm in the middle of shopping drives me crazy. Also, when looking at a product with multiple options, clicking on an option that is not default never loads the images. Also to look at your orders you have to wait 5-10 seconds for the page with a million links to load before the orders button appears. And now the super annoying Alexa popup every time I look at a product. They just keep making this app into a larger and larger garbage pile.

Please fix this app. I keep having one issue after another. *First issue: If you need to type a message or comment in the app (ie: leaving reviews, texting for help etc. ), the keyboard pops up and covers the dialog box so you can't see what you're typing. *Second issue: The orders page will not load. Sometimes I can get it after hitting back, but most the time it's just a blank page. I can't check on shipping status, returns etc. This is an important feature and needs corrected please.

This latest update is so frustrating. I am unable to find where to buy or rent movies. Prime Video says I have to go to the Amazon app to actually buy/rent any movie. The Amazon app doesn't have a place now to actually buy/rent. The movie (Rocky) says it is available but there isn't anyway to actually purchase it. Also on Prime Video, there is an extra step to access my purchases where before, that was the page that loaded. Very frustrating. Poor design.

Do not update. I updated this app and now there's a Amazon echo button at the lower right side of the screen that i constantly press by mistake and i don't know how to get rid of. It's extremely annoying. I don't know why Amazon keeps trying to shove alexa down our throats. Now i can't print return labels from the app. It automatically takes me to the desktop site which tells me that my printer isn't encrypted so it won't print the label. Thanks Amazon

It works, but after shutdown of PrimeNow app and integration of Whole Foods grocery, the experience is worse. Most frustrating is not being able to have two different default addresses selected for the Amazon and Grocery sections of the App. Requires constant toggle of home versus WF store address. Overall, updates to app in last year have not improved usability much, but have required relearning layout. Also, multiple presses to do common tasks,like get back to home screen. App is slower too.

(1) Search results are basically ads and irrelevant to the search criteria. The recent updates have basically screwed up the shopping experience. (2) I don't understand the need for the so called "influencers" popping up on the homepage. I can decide for myself what I need. I would recommend moving them to a different tab or at the bottom. Waste of space that can be used for something better.

Abysmal Performance. Past orders are unbearably slow to load, as is using the Whole Foods delivery functionality. Also, I've had issues with 1/3 of my orders this year- a lot, considering I moved into a new home, so have been using Amazon quite a lot. Customer service, which is outsourced, is mostly useless. Given I now have access to many big box retailers, who offer delivery, I am seriously considering canceling my Prime account.

I wish the app would work. I can never access my account page unless I refresh the app by closing and reopening a few times, and the lag is ridiculous. Makes me just use Amazon in my web browser. /: And I wish there were a dark mode for light sensitive folks. This isn't a reason for the low review just a random additional issue I have with the app. What makes me give it such a low rating is that the app is barely functionable 85% of the time, and 85% might be a bit of a stretch.

I would probably order even more than I do if I could view my lists. Most of the time I can't scroll down on the app so I have to type in what I remember is on my list when I want to order something. This is a longstanding glitch that never seems to be fixed. I have a Samsung S9+ and it works fine with every other app on the phone. I hope someone fixes the issue soon.

What fresh mess has Amazon done. App has gotten awful. It appears they have taken the not so customer friendly route as everyone else. I cannot contact any sellers, that portion of the screen is buried. I've reinstalled the app, restarted my phone....nothing. saving on technical support will ultimately cause this company to lose. I hate unnecessary and inconvenient change.

Customer service is difficult and infuriating. I love the user experience that this app provides, but ever since I got a new number I haven't been able to reset it. I've tried disabling the two factor authentication, it still wants me to verify my identity with only my phone number. It would be completely fine if I could verify with my email, but unfortunately, no such luck. I've called customer service multiple times, I still cannot access my account.

Pissed beyond belief. Spent hours on a shipping list then at the last second Amazon changed my payment method then wouldn't let me change it back. So I had to cancel the order to change it. Well that wiped all traces of the entire order completely and made me have to start over. Prime cancelled. Never ordering from Amazon again. Hint: maybe when someone selects "change payment method" it doesn't mean they want to completely erase their order with no chance of retrieving it, geniuses.

Update!!! After several months of ordering even with third party buys. I haven't had a problem yet , yes I've returned several things that weren't just what I thought would work for me , no never was there a problem with the product, just it wasn't just what I thought I needed, but without fail , full refund without complaint from Amazon. I will continue to use Amazon for most of my needs and wants because I can't get out much, they allow me to buy and check it out and Return if I need to.

Easy to use, very convenient as far as next day and free shipping, lost items, returns and refunds. There has never been a hassle in my case, anytime I've had an issue with a purchase it has been straightened out right away. Amazon video allows my family and I to watch very good movies and shows. Amazon also has kindle, so you get offers for free e-books.

Issues with App when trying to print out Return label. I actually have to go online and print it out on their website, which is absolutely ridiculous and inconvenient. I also have an issue scrolling through my orders, it won't scroll through all my current orders. I never had an issue with this app, until some IDIOT decided to change the entire format and change the layout of the app . "If it ain't broken, don't fix it" This new version seems to be amateurish and definitely not user friendly.

It's usually a great app with infinite items to choose from at usually competitive prices. Biggest issue for me is when a product has options for multiple features (i.e. color, size, etc.), one drop down list will open but I cannot select an option. The second or third drop down won't even open at all.

As of last month, the app keeps switching to French! I first assumed it may be because I'm clicking affiliated links through posts that take me to the app but all those links are in English, based out of the US. Doesn't help that getting to Language preferences from the app is virtually impossible. I've been Googling how to switch back to English and through an external link, will change my preference back to English, but it doesn't seem to ACTUALLY save on my phone app. Super frustrating!

I'm confused as to why the ability to change country and currency in app has been removed. It used to be such an easy and simple thing to access. Now you can only change country, not currency. I've had to redownload the app since my profile was stuck on showing everything in dollars instead of pounds, despite having my country set as United Kingdom. These backward changes are quite frustrating :s

There is no more review section on the product page! The only way to get to reviews now is to click the review stars at the top of the product page but it 9 times out of 10 doesn't work! Also the app is buggy when you are on the checkout screen & decide to go back to remove or add something to your cart it has glitches multiple times back to the checkout page! Also the barcode scanner is pretty much useless!

UPDATE: The order refresh got fixed for a period of time following my original review, but is now back again! Orders section is performing poorly and is becoming frustrating to use. Some items are not showing, even those currently being shipped. The only way to find the missing ones are to search your orders. Also, EVERY time you click into an order and then go back to your list of orders, the list refreshes and places you back at the top. I can't find a way to change this.

In the Deliveries section of the Subscribe & Save, it would be really helpful if it showed the total cost of that delivery and not just the individual prices of the items being sent. That way I know the full amount my card will be charged after it's all shipped. Otherwise, I absolutely LOVE ❤️ the app!! I never experience any slow loading others have mentioned. I literally will spend 8 hours at a time, couple times a week, looking for the perfect items to add to my cart and buy on pay day!!

Unfortunately I have to write my first negative experience of Amazon. Long story short I found a promotion that showed up online and in the app. I put the items in my cart that matched the terms of the promotion, did not apply. So I chatted with customer service who assured me how to fix this problem, then randomly got told I needed a call back. So I did that, and after an hour of transfers, the promotion page magically said this is no longer available. I am beyond disappointed and frustrated.

Looping through the same options when im trying to return an item is extremely draining. Been waiting almost two months. Says its lost. Cant get to a point of actually returning or refunding cause it just says speak to the seller. Amazons the seller. Talk to customer support. Which item. Talk to seller. Amazons the seller. Which item. Talk to the seller....awful experience. At very least it is overwhelmingly discouraging. So appearantly im just out 300. Guess ill just kick rocks

I love shopping with Amazon. However, the app is incredibly slow. The time it takes to switch through options on my phone or even open the app is tremendously slower than on my PC. Granted, my phone is now 2 years old but even when I first got it, it was still slow AF. I wish Amazon would put more time into functionality.

Since the most recent update I can no longer add items to my wishlist via the app. Now I have to revert back to a browser to add items, it looks like prior to the update, they tried to make it a long press to select which list to add to which would have been amazing. Hopefully it is repaired quickly so I'm not having to go back to using the browser.

New update is not good at all. Very. very slow even in 5 G area. I echo some other people's criticism about shipping transparency. I have not ordered because shipping changed at checkout even to my primary address. I can understand if I change address at checkout. I cannot search by size. It brings up other sizes. Not even a range. Looking for plus sizes I get medium only options. Let's not even discuss the inconsistent sizing. Find a great XXL then look at measurements. Not even close

I am trying to get in contact with Amazon, but it is IMPOSSIBLE!!! I singed up for prime video's free trial and decided to continue with subscription....payment was deducted from my debit card, but it still shows on Amazon that I do not have a subscription for prime video.. Although they have the payment..... No way to contact them... Therefore I am stuck!!!!!!!!!?

Idk why I keep returning to the app thinking that it's going to refresh so I can see my recent purchases.. I have never had so much trouble on an app.. It glitches constantly and takes me literally hours if I want to make a large purchase as the options are very little and don't show me what I am looking for until the last absolute minute, And then still something would happen to make me completely annoyed and not purchase. I see in the reviews that all of the issues have never been resolved..

Delivery Notifications no longer work. I used to get a notification when a package was delivered, but now I get nothing. I have verified that all notification settings are enabled in the app, as well as my device settings. Delivery Notifications are the biggest reason I have this app installed. If they don't fix this soon, there's no reason for me to keep the app.

More and more likely gonna uninstall this app. Amazon has proven to me that they're unreliable. I was supposed to get a package on a certain day and it's telling me it's delayed in transit and its gonna be up to 5 days late even though I needed the item and I ordered it early because they've been reliable in the past and it's still going to be late for Idk what reason.. Amazon also use to have prices from low to high when u filter. Now it's just random prices scattered and the filter is useless.

Don't get me wrong. I love Amazon. The prices, shipping, Prime member perks. But I HATE the shopping app! God could it load any slower? I don't think so. It can't load anything in a timely fashion. Nothing. It frequently just shuts down for no reason and I have to restart. I have dozens of other apps on my phone. They all load up and run just fine. Not Amazon. Slow as hell. eBay, Walmart, Wish and AliExpress work just fine. Please Amazon, fix your app. Love ya

The search engine is all but unusable. It ignores forced keywords, and excluded ones. The filters it offers you are random and not comprehensive. It is designed to take the ability to aggressively filter away from you to place more products in front of you. It is highly unrecommended to use if you are look for highly specific or graded items. Google instead. It actually listens then links to the item on Amazon.

Not getting Shipment Notifications. I have checked everything in the app for shipment notifications. I used to get notification for all shipments up until about 2 weeks ago. Now there are no more texts to let me know when the shipment is on the way, within 10 stops, or that it has been delivered. I have looked at every setting and I've reset everything, but I'm still not getting notifications that the shipment is going to arrive or that it's been delivered. Do I need to uninstall and reinstall?

Quickly becoming my most avoided shopping app due to the fact that there's absolutely NO WAY to filter out the international vendors from the rest. At least on eBay you can. I purchased a razor that after a few months I thought "where is this razor???" So when I tracked it it's apparently on a slow boat from China which I would avoid on eBay but Amazon you don't find out until it's too late. Thank God for refunds but still need to provide a filter.

Error keeps popping up indicatiing the app has stopped, especially while other apps are being used like Waze which makes it dangerous because the Amazon message covers the Waze up while driving. You get an error message over whatever app is open. Tried everything to correct this, nothing fixes it. Also, app is extremely slow especially when trying to access order info or lists.

I use Amazon App mostly to organize and compare products that i need to buy for my home but recently the "add to list" button is complete gone so stuff has been added to my cart but the cart only holds 50 products regardless of cost. I could save for later but it's not organized and not easy to look at for later. Please bring back the "Add to List" button. Shipping and products are top notch, have never received a bad product via Amazon .

i held off updating this stupid app as long as i could to avoid having to deal with the permanent spy button, but as of today the old version no longer works and i had to bite the bullet. LET US DISABLE THAT HOVERING ALEXA BUTTON!!! omg. that thing's annoying, useless, and extremely unwanted. it makes the whole app worse, and it was already worse to start with because the new menu organization is awful, confusing, and hard to find anything in. i might have to just use the web page version.

Shopping experience is great but something is broken in your code. When I'm in my cart and I swipe from right to left to save an item for later, the entire UI below the light blue delivery info bar shifts and pushes the contents directly into the very left side of my screen. This doesn't happen when I swipe the other way around. It's like the left side padding ceases the exist and it's very odd. I though maybe I needed to update the app and I did so.....issue is still there though.

The live streams are super anoying and start playing when you are just trying to scroll past. Also, wishlists are super buggy. 500 words is not enough space to list everything wrong with them. They often jump back to the top or skip around while scrolling. Items appear duplicated (but are not, so don't delete them!) And an icon of a long removed item is still the default list image... There are about 15 other bugs as well.

Amazon is losing its appeal now. Prime membership meant quick service to me. However more and more items are not 2 day delivery. Items from Whole Food are worst. I got milk which was 1 day from expiry. Most vegetables seem like ones that were discarded. I have started going to grocery store braving Covid as I was totally disappointed. I have also stopped buying vitamins as they are poor quality. The format for Prime videos keep changing so you need to learn again how to select.

I uninstalled the app and I'm getting ready to cancel my Amazon account because they make it so difficult to simply sign out of your account. It would be very easy to make a "sign out" button somewhere within one's account. But they hide it within menus that do not exist, such as the "account and lists" menu that does not exist.

Absolutely LOVE shopping with Amazon, they have everything I look for with better deals and/or better quality. Returning products is very simple and no frustratingly long delays for money back. Shipping speeds are very fast for me especially with Prime and ive never recieved a damaged product delivered to me. I've never had a problem with Amazon so it's my #1 go to for when it comes to shopping online. To the many years of great service!

I've been an Amazon customer since 2012 and I'm about to cancel my subscription. Between them raising the subscription price and just about every single time I place an order for a new item 9 times out of 10 I receive an item with an LPN label which I'm pretty sure means it's been previously bought and returned. The convience isn't even worth the price anymore.

Amazon is terrible. Horrible customer service. We were better off with stores and more choices. Prepare to blow wads of time to fix issues, getting inferior products, and inflating prices, from Amazon's 'favored nations' clause with merchant/seller accounts. Prime is a rip off, expedited shipping times are now gone, and Amazon now requires purchasing items in bulk to ship them. Also, if you get a defective item, there is no way to 'replace' them. Also, everything is knockoffs from China, cheap.

ive never seen an app that didn't want to be an app more than this one. scrolling is awful on the lists page, it lags horribly and you can only smoothly scroll if you swipe really fast. kinda negates the whole browsing thing. no pages load, they all give me the error page. the dogs do take the edge off a little, hence the 2 stars. the amount of sponsored listings makes it impossible to find anything you're looking for. eat my shorts, bezos, make a good app.

I've been an Amazon Prime customer for several years. I don't have an issue with the software or customer service, Returning items is simple. However, my only issue lies with Prime delivering items within 24/36 hrs. If I have to wait 4/5 days tops I feel that Prime isn't working out entirely for me. With the exception of free shipping but not the quick turn around that you have come to expect. Other then that, Amazon facilitates shopping online. Spending money has become way to easy. lol

This app is like going back in time. It both looks and feels dated. Scrolling does not work properly and once you've decided to continue you purchase Amazon will make sure you can't cancel the operation in a simple way. They even hide the logout option by purpose. I also get very funny notifications like "maybe you are interested in a cake plate." What?!

Amazon bribed me to install the app, so I tried it for a minute. Every single item on all of Amazon says it "cannot be shipped to my location." Funny, things ship just fine from the browser 🤔 Edit: I figured out why. It tried to autodetect my location and decided I was across the border. No apparent way to fix this. So I'm stuck shopping on the wrong country's Amazon. *slowclap*. Good job, dev team. You have my shipping address but you decided to do this instead.

The worst shopping service in my life. I hope I can rate it under zero instead of one. Firstly, GC can't be transferred to another country and money can't be reversed back to me. Secondly, shipping fees from one country to another are so expensive, even a very small micro sd card makes you pay more than $35 for shipping. Thirdly, there is no promo code working at all. At last, They rejected payment by my American Federal bank account, both my visa cards, my PayPal, Payeer and Payoneer accounts.

While the app is refined enough to allow an easy shopping experience, its also a minefield of scammy subscriptions that you will automatically be subscribed to unless you opt out upon every purchase. We all know that amazon doesnt treat its workers very well, especially in other countries, and this is why i try to leave amazon as a last resort for buying products. Its caught me out a couple of times over the last 2 years and ive missed the automatic subscription that has left me out of pocket.

The app is fine, but one thing that drives me absolutely insane is that when looking at product review photos, the first photo I tap on is ALWAYS low-resolution (like it's just the thumbnail photo zoomed in). Swipe left or right to another photo and those will be full-resolution, but the first one is ALWAYS PIXELATED. This doesn't happen with product images. This forces me to open the photo NEXT to the one I want to see, and then swipe to it. If there's only one reviewer photo, I'm out of luck.

Ok, the only issue that I have with this app is the list view. The first item is pushed out to the left(difficult visibility) due to misplaced " list option view" on the screen, whenever I check/view my list. Like, will one of the developers fix this bug please! I wasn't going to say anything, but it's been this way for a LONG time now and drives me 🥴. Maybe it's my ocd 🤷🏾‍♂️ if I could've post a photo for better understanding, then I would have. Sorry. 😧

I downloaded this app to try whether it would be better than the web version BUT unfortunately it was missing one super useful feature - choosing the items that I want to proceed for checkout without erasing the others from my cart or moving them to wishlist. Other than that I feel like it's slower than when browsing on the web version (might just be my case). At this point I don't see the real value of keeping the app.... which I'd really like with the mentioned feature.

I order everything with Amazon. just like how easy they make the process from beginning to end. Even if the companies selling make a mistake, Amazon will help. and the idea of being able to compare products from all-over. I feel bad for local and other stores because they are loosing so much business, at least me. I don't remember when I went to a Mall last, if you go now they don't have inventory anymore and they are learning to move into online shopping but Amazon makes it so conveniently easy

Well organized but does not list all of my product ratings. Seems like the app is not in sync with my online activity. Sometimes the prices are more compared to online. My last purchase consisted of many purchases. After I paid the purchases were broken up into different invoices. I wanted all the purchases on the one invoice and wonder if I'm being charged twice for items and credited for special discounts. Not to happy about this.

Save for later items disappeared. Contacted support, they kept asking me to provide the list. Being that I can't provide the list, they couldn't help. Asked to speak to a live person, that person said "there is nothing in your saved for later" ...that's why I called. They couldn't tell me why. Asked for next level up, same thing. Unable to help. Found out 2 friends had the same thing, items deleted. Amazon refused to acknowledge they may have a bug or help resolve.

Full screen non-skippable ads when you launch the app are the worst! I'm opening your app to buy things and give you money. You don't need to make that harder with annoying ads. If anything it makes hate the thing in the ad and want to use this app less. Also please let me disable the videos inside the app. They eat up data, are annoying, and way to easy to accidently click on them scrolling through the app. Just make it easy for me to get into the app and give you money. How hard is that?

I think the new changes that we can no longer purchase ebooks through the Amazon app and the Kindle app in the new upgrade is RIDICULOUS!!!! What is the point of the apps if we now have to go online just to purchase books! I don't like this new change and I'm sure I'm not the only one that finds it annoying and inconvenient. On the apps I can just purchase a book right away. SMH

I've had Prime for years but I've had so many issues in the past year. There's something wrong with their ordering system. My orders get canceled all the time and they always say it was done on my end but I never cancel orders. I ordered a robot vacuum on Prime Day, they canceled my order, and then wouldn't honor the price it was on Prime Day when I tried to reorder it because it was sold by a 3rd party. Disgraceful! The problem is with their system. A billion dollar company can't get it right?

Amazon just made their app worse...again. Now you have to dig for your order history & tracking. "My Orders" used to be the 1st icon on the shortcut tab (bottom right). Now it is buried at the bottom of a very long list of Amazon junk I'm not interested in. And the shortcuts are advertisements - again, for Amazon junk I don't care about and rarely use (Today's Deals, Prime Reading, etc).

Keeps erroring out. Every time I have brought this app up for the past couple of months I get a picture of a dog and something says uh-oh, it looks like something went wrong on our end. Well how about you guys fix your end? I've reinstalled the app several times and it still doesn't work. Get your stuff together. EDIT: A month later and it still doesn't work right. Won't work on my phone for more than a few seconds, and I even tried installing it on my Chromebook and got the same result.

Can't view my orders. For a few weeks, it's been hit and miss if I get to see the orders list page which. Its getting annoying as I use that page to check when an item is arriving or to rebuy things I've bought. I've not been able to see my orders for two days solid now. It just goes to that awful dog page. Update: Contacted the developer and only received a generic email back with no mention of the problem I've had. Still not able to view the order page.

Just moved to Android 12. New phone. Took two hours and a long tech support call because the login kept reporting that I was logging in from random cities all over the nation. Then not allowing me to verify it was me. Have up and used the web page. Now I can login, but it still says I'm on some random cities. Permissions are correct tech support tried to help. Have up. And I do give up.

I am getting sick and tired of amazon constantly changing the user interface for its app. Every single time i have to go on a hunt to find out where now the designers have hidden the manage subscriptions menu. Change for the sake of change causes more harm than good. Each time there is an interface change i dont see any positives. Clients have to relearn the location of all the menus all over again? Seriously, what is amazon doing? Is this a game? What value is amazon trying to bring?

It literally crashes every 4 minutes. Honestly pointless at this point to download it, or open it to shop cause all its gunna do is crash before I actually finish what I'm shopping for. And I'm not trying to spend all day online every 4 minutes reopening the app just so I can find what I need. I really hope it gets fixed. Because I quite enjoyed amazon.

App doesn't load anymore! In the last four weeks the app keeps showing its "Uh-oh! Something went wrong on our end." message. No resolution, no update, no bug fix patch, and no communication from Amazon as to why. And it wasn't fixed in time for Black Friday! Really unexpected show. The computer-version works okay, and it's a faff trying to use Chrome or IE on my phone and NOT have it redirect to the broken app. Good service in itself, but very poor user experience on the mobile app.

Unable to change between countries. I move between two countries, and have family and friends in two others, with accounts in each country. I used to be able to change between locations, now the app has me locked to one country, and it is not of use for the foreseeable future! Please update so we can switch between countries like we used to be able to.

Post update use is ok, just slow. Relevant push updates are either sporadic or none existent. I HATE the way the App clears/resets previous searches/activity & defaults back to the home screen if I go off app & come back; I then have to start again! The current app is definitely less responsive & slower than the pre-face change update! Note: I have re-edit my original review I wrote immediately after the app facelift because a few elements have been resolved & improved. The review above stands.

I have been a Prime member for years. I have a suggestion to improve the app. When I am shopping, I like to look at colors of different items next to each other to color coordinate. It is very hard to tell if items match each other. Such as do these multi colored pants go with this shade of red. Or do these outdoor chair cushions match the tablecloth I have picked out. If there was a way to drag the item in the cart up and down to place them next to each other it would be helpful.

Normally I love this app, but with this last update I absolutely hate what you did to my searched items. I can only see the very end of the words of what I was searching but can fully read 'in all departments'. Totally not helpful. I use my search list as a kind of shopping list. Maybe it's just my phone (note 8) but if not, please fix it.

I've been an Amazon Prime member for years now. Despite the fact that the app constantly crashes (or slows down) I've always enjoyed being part of it. But with the recent updates, I am unable to take a screenshot of the app. I am unsure what was the purpose of this. It's just become so frustrating that I consider not using the app at all. Please, let the users take their screenshots, it's way more convenient like that.

If Amazon did groceries in arkansas and had a point system for fuel like Kroger does, I would buy from them exclusively. I absolutely love the subscribe and save system. I started doing it when my son was a baby and I have saved so much money. It's so easy. I get pretty much everything from them besides fresh groceries. If I don't need some of the items on my list, I just skip them for the month. I never run out of any of the essentials.

Amazon used to be pretty reliable. Now they can't keep a schedule. Items that have prime delivery don't show up for weeks. The app doesn't update the shipping info so you have no idea when it'll show up. Customer service can't cancel or refund the purchase until it's returned so that's an endless cycle. Honestly if this was a one off, yeah things happen. But this has been happening for years. I pay for prime so can I get a refund for the dozens of orders that don't arrive by the guaranteed time?

Need to be able to add more info in additional delivery instructions. As for some odd reason delivery drivers do not even attempt to deliver to my address (even though they lie and say they have). I live in an apartment block with concierge at main reception, CCTV throughout the building, plus I have a Google doorbell. Yes there are several entrances, but only 1 for the public. So would be good to be able to post a picture stating where the entrance is like other delivery apps do.

Terrible update. Went from swift and reliable to having so much of a lag that the website is preferable. And goodness, when the hell is there going to be a dark theme. This app burns up so much battery through the screen with the white background. At no point do they address this. (Instead they remove the option on the Kindle app.) What are they waiting for?

Can't wait til anything remotely close to a competitor comes along. Tired of paying increasingly higher fees for mediocre customer service when things go wrong, which they seem to do more a lot more than they used to. When something does go wrong w an order, most of the time it requires the help of a live agent on the phone bc either the bot doesn't understand or the agent via chat doesn't get it, either. I love some features, but the hassles are getting to be more than the $140/yr is worth.

Not intuitive interface, worse than the old. Once you type anything in Search, it's impossible to delete it, only overwrite with something else. Somehow, the app started pointing to my US site, it was absolutely impossible to re-point it back to Oz, amazon help desk was useless. Had to uninstall and install again.

Unable to shop. Keeps freezing up and stopping only a few minutes in to searching for an item. ***Update*** Figured out the problem. The app has limited storage. When storage reaches that limit it slows down or stops. Clearing the cache isn't enough. You have to clear storage if app starts slowing down and/or after each time you use it. Amazon needs to reduce file sizes to decrease needed storage and also offer automatic storage clearing at close of app option.

I have been a prime member for years. I use to love Amazon. Recently though they have failed miserably. I pay a slightly higher price because it is " Prime" and I make it up on the delivery. Over the past 6 months I have had numerous orders with delayed delivery and they usually cancel the order just for me to reorder the same product with the same vendor to have it delivered on time. I am not sure what changed with Amazon, but please go back to the old way.

This app works to buy stuff, but will not allow for Hub Locker use/package recovery. You need to cancel the order because you cannot retrieve the item(s) from the damn locker. Annoying and causes a delay when you're paying g for the quicker delivery. It would be great if it worked, or even better, the Amazon Delivery drivers would use secure boxes or take the time to place packages between doors or for that matter, treat packages like it was something they bought! DISAPPOINTED

Why on 🌎 aren't there more stars 🤨? I can not sing your praise loud enough. Simply put Amazon goes above and beyond EVERY SINGLE TIME.
